1.content:
"Ugh...." Reddmon said getting up, "I feel horrible" the two-tailed (red) Renamon-like digimon sighed. "So this is the town that holds the key to my future?" Looking down at Shinjuku Reddmon laughed. "Kind of pathetic."

(Yes, Reddmon starts as a jerk. Don't worry about it. He'll change after he meets Renamon)
(Also reddmon's forms are: Champion: ViralReddmon(Reddmon with golden armonr on his torso and legs instead of his two tails), Ultimate: DeviReddmon(ViralReddmon with demon wings), DarkMega: UltraReddDramon[A giant two-tailed, red(pun intended) dragon with an uncontrollable attitude(in other words Reddmon loses his mind when he turns into UltraReddDramon)]) (Finally Reddmon has a 'predatory' nature, he's the digimon of destruction and he...well...destroys anyone who opposes him)(PS after Reddmon meets Renamon , and after some training, he'll be able to DNA digivolve) (Renamon+Reddmon= DeviRenamon,an extra large Renamon with DeviReddmon's wings) (Sakuyamon+UltraReddDramon=Sakuyamon Dragon Armor Mode)
1.title: Reddmon awakens

choices: Sneak into city hall and forge a birth certificate
Do above, but cause some mischief afterwards
11.content: After a dark flash Reddmon was gone, and a young teenaage boy with blonde hair stood in his place. "It's been a long time since I was human.It brings back great memories." 'Redd' thought to himself. (Yes Redd has no last name, he doesn't remember it) There was a sudden explosion! "What the heck was that?!!!" said Redd. A pair of binioculars formed in the air in front of him. Grabbing them Redd proceeded to search the city. "Tamers? I thought they would have retired after the whole D-Reaper incident" Redd said to no-one. "They everything under control, I wonder what I should do first, since their busy?"( Redd/Reddmon stores things in an etheral state of existance so things he needs just 'appear')
11.title: Enter Redd (oh yeah great alias)

111.content:
The city hall wasn't hard to find, but, to Redd's surprise, had a very strong security force. It also had a large number of security cameras but that wasn't a problem. Redd took out his digi-vice (it works on himself lol) and, when no one was watching, pulled out a blue card as well. Walking into a nearby restroom Redd walked into a stall and slashed the card.
-MATRIX DIGIVOLUTION-
REDDMON MATRIX DIGIVOLVE TO: DEVIREDDMON!
----
DeviReddmon slammed open the stall door, knocking it off its hinges in the process. Luckily no-one else was in the restroom at the time or his whole plan would've been ruined. slipping over to the door DeviReddmon slipped open just a crack.Normally, the demon digimon would've thought about making ameal out of one the innocent passers-by, but now wasn't the time for snacking. A gas grenade materialized in his hand. Pulling off the pin, DeviReddmon threw the grenade out of the slight opening and shut the door fast. There was a sharp 'FOOMP' and DeviReddmon held his breath, making sure he didn't breathe in the gases, in order to preserve conciousness
By the time DeviReddmon reached the room containing documents such as birth certificates, the gas had already spread throughout the whole building. Quickly, but carefully, the demon forged his own birth certificate. As he prepared to leave, he noticed some files sticking out of one the filing cabinets he opened when looking for the place to store his birth certificate. The file was marked: TAMERS. Quickly snatching the file and dematerializing it, DeviReddmon slipped out of the room. As he did he heard a moaning sound coming from the direction he had to go towards. "Shoot! One of the guards is waking up way too early!" The demon's hungry stomach growled in response to his outburst.
As the guard got up he saw a strange figure headed towards him. Pulling out his gun he warned the figure,"Stop or I'll shoot!" The figure kept coming. The guard fired, a mistake, though he wouldn't to find out.
As soon as the gun fired everything slowed in DebiReddmon's eyes. He saw the bullet coming at him, but he wasn't worried. Putting out his hand so quickly that it wouldn't be seen, he grabbed the bullet out of mid-air and threw it back at the guard. He threw so hard, in fact, that the bullet went twice as fast back as it did forward!
The guard fell to the ground, death was instantaneous. DeviReddmon walked up to his body and smirked. "I shouldn't let a good body go to waste, so I'll just take it with me." Picking up the dead body, he proceeded to stuff it into his mouth, uniform, gun, and all!
DeviReddmon headed back to the restroom in which he had originally transformed. He wasn't dumb, he knew that if he ran and a person who was on the security tapes wasn't there when the police arrived people would be suspicious. Prying a pipe off of the wall he lifted it appove his head, and dropped it. The split second that the pipe took to hit him was all he needed to switch to his human form, although he probably didn't enjoy the fact that he was imediately knocked by the falling pipe. (XD)
111.title: Having a MANwich

1111.content:
Redd woke up in a hospital with a bandage over his head, he gave out a small smile as he knew his plan worked. He jumped out of the bed and made sure no one was around as he jumped out the window and made his way to the center of town to get a feel for it.

When he reached the roof of a building to sit on he rematerialized the tamer document from earlier. He began to go through them memorizing names and digimon, when he came to Rika's file he smiled as he looked at her picture. "Cute" he said as he read her file looking down to see Renamon's picture, "very cute" he said with a grin.
1111.title: Redd wakes up

11111.content:
Redd smiled as he dematerialized the folder and jumped up looking over the city. "Hhmmm maybe I can get that cute Renamon to come out" he said as he built an energy ball in his hand. He threw the energy ball down at the street watching explode in a fiery ball. He laughed as the few people on the street began to run in terror from the explosion and the two tailed red fox causing it. He threw another ball before jumping to the street to do more damage up close.

Most of the people had disappeared from the streets and the few left were running and screaming. He smiled as he threw another ball at a car causing it to explode in flames and flip on its side. He admired his work as he walked down the middle of the street waiting for someone to show up.

He sensed some coming closer with a digimon with them, when he turned to see he saw.....
11111.title: Can't find trouble? Make it come to you!

111111.content:
"Hello ladies." Reddmon said as he bowed slightly. "Aren't I lucky to run into a pair of pearls in the proverbial rough." Rika smirked, "Did you spend all morning thinking up that lame pick-up line?" Reddmon frowned, "Do you really think you should make smart remarks to a dangerous person?" There was a pause, and Reddmon sighed, "Do you need a hint?"
---
Matrix Digivolution

"Reddmon matrix digivolve to... DeviReddmon!"
---
"Now do you recognize me? I'm sure I was on the news." From the nasty looks he was getting, DeviReddmon decided he had his point. "All right then. Bring it!"
111111.title: R and R... and R

1111111.content:
Renamon decided to end this quick and fast as she teleported behind him and gave him a hard kick to the back of his head. Renamon expected to see him fall forward but when he didn't move she realized her attack had no effect. DeviReddmon whipped around and grabbed her leg lifting her off the ground with a large smile on his face. "Come on that the best you got" he said as he flung her through the air. Renamon landed about forty feet away with a loud thump as she hit the ground.

She sat up to see DeviReddmon charging her....
1111111.title: Forward attacks never work....

11111111.content:
Renamon barley got up as he grabbed her by the throat and lifted her off the ground. He smiled and said "I'm not impressed," he then noticed a smile on Renamon's face. "Diamond storm" she yelled aiming it directly at his face, He screamed in pain dropping her and began to wipe at his face trying to regain his sight. "Power paw" he heard her yell before feeling a sharp pain in multiple places all over his body. He stumbled back and reverted to normal, smiling as he did so, he was hurt but not beaten.

He teleported behind Renamon and proceeded to return the attack she just gave him. She screamed in pain as she flew through the air hitting the ground hard, she stood up and now both of them could barley stand as they breathed heavy, a grin was on Reddmon's face as he did so. "I didn't think anyone could beat me" he said as he fell over loosing conciseness. Renamon moved forward and stood over him; she was too injured to finish him and proceeded to fall on top of him. Rika ran over to help Renamon....
11111111.title: Ouch

choices: Renamon wakes up a few hours later.
111111111.content:
"Renamon!" Rika yelled as she ran over to help her, Reddmon was doing his best to try not to bust out laughing as Rika ran over. Rika began shaking Renamon trying to wake her up; Renamon only gave out a low groan as she did. Reddmon began to feel a bit sorry for the cute renamon he just beat up, he smiled a bit as he sat up causing Rika to recoil in terror. Rika didn't know what to, as her friend was still unconscious and being lifted up by him.

He stood before her with Renamon's arm over his shoulder, a bit of blood was dripping down his muzzle and one of his eyes was closed. "Where to?" he said with a smile as Rika's jaw almost fell of her face. Rika stuttered and stammered for a second trying to figure out what was going on, a minute a go he tried to kill them and now he wants to help?

Rika didn't know whether to trust him or not but didn't really have that much of a choice as she led him home.
111111111.title: He's faking it. I knew it.

choices: Something happens before he finds someplace to stay
1111111112.content:
After Reddmon took Rika and Renamon to their home he ran off.(which is rather surprising considering his current injuries) After making his way to Shinjuku Park, he climbed up the nearest tree(Ok more like jumped up the nearest tree) and leaned back on a low branch. 'What was I doing? Why do I have to be so... despicable?' he thought to himself. 'It's weird though... I've never felt as guilty as I did after I fought Renamon... It's as if I- No, I won't even think it!' He shook his head to clear his mind.

Looking up, Reddmon noticed how low the sun was in the sky. "I better go find someplace to stay..."
1111111112.title: Confused Thoughts

choices: To injured can't do much of anything.
Take em out quick and easy.
11111111122.content:
Reddmon jumped out of the tree and hit the ground, he stumbled a bit as he did still weak from his injuries. He wanted to rub his muzzle but the wound Renamon gave him still hurt, he groaned a bit and placed his hands on the side of his muzzle. "Hope this don't leave any scars" he said to himself as he gave out a small laugh.

"PYRO BLASTER" he heard someone yell and was able to dodge a fireball at the last second. "I think you singed some of my fur" Reddmon said as he dusted one of his tails and looking over to see Takato and Growlmon. "You sure this is the guy? Takato asked Growlmon. "No doubting it I can smell Renamon on him to".

"Takato Matsuki and Growlmon" Reddmon muttered to himself "the evolved form of Guilmon". Reddmon didn't want to deal with this right now, he just wanted to find someplace to sleep and recover. He sighed as Growlmon launched another fireball at him, which he dodged easily, and prepared his counter attack.
11111111122.title: Takato and Guilmon

111111111221.content:
Reddmon gagged, fell to one knee and began to cough violently, his injuries were worse than he thought and he couldn't do much against these two. He barely dodged the next two fireballs that were launched at him and nearly lost his footing on the last one. "Damn" he thought to himself as his vision began to blur and he felt light headed.

He fell to one knee and started coughing again, "Take this" he heard Growlmon yell as he launched another fireball....
111111111221.title: To weak can't stand.

choices: Continue as Reddmon ( many hours later)
1111111112211.content:
Move damnit MOVE" he thought as his body was unresponsive and only twitched a bit. He saw the fireball grow closer; he scoffed and thought "I could have dodged this easily a long time ago." He fell forward and waited for the ball to hit him; he heard a loud booming noise and managed to look up to see Renamon standing in front of him, the fireball having been deflected by her. "Renamon what are you doing?" Growlmon said as Renamon moved over to Reddmon, "sorry but he's mine" She said as she lifted him up.

"Crap" he thought as Renamon teleported from rooftop to rooftop at high speeds, he soon saw Rika's house in the distance as he began to loose conciseness.
1111111112211.title: Renamon helps him

111111111222.content:
Growlmon's fireball flew right past Reddmon as he began to charge them both. Growlmon didn't have time to react as Reddmon's foot slammed into his face, knocking him back to Guilmon and into a tree. Guilmon was knocked out cold in that one move so Reddmon saw no reason to stay any longer as he jumped into a tree and teleported away.

Reddmon was sitting on top of a house bandaging himself up as best he could with a first aid kit he rarely uses. His face was the thing most bandaged; covering one of his eyes and most of his muzzle, but the bandage was loose and makeshift at best so it wouldn't hold for very long. He bandaged the rest of himself up including his arms, legs, chest, and one of his tails. Reddmon sighed and fell back looking up at the sky, he didn't know what time it was nor did he care.

He didn't want to sleep on top of a building so he knew he needed a place to sleep...
111111111222.title: Guilmon gets knocked the %$ out.

1111111112221.content:
"I need a place to sleep" he grumbled as he jumped up, it was getting dark so cover wouldn't be to hard to find. He hopped along for a while, looking for a "for sale" sign or something when he noticed a small house on a hill. He landed in front of the house and peeked inside, "empty good" he said as he teleported inside. The house was two stories and looked like it had been abandoned for quite some time, as the furniture was covered in dust and sheets.

He smiled when he flipped the switch to see light come on, "place must have a built in generator" he mumbled to himself as he began to uncover the furniture. He smiled when he finished checking the house; it was a two story, with a basement, and a pool, with three beds, four baths. He sat on the couch and smiled when his stomach rumbled, "calm down I'll get us some food" he said as he patted his stomach. He hopped up and teleported outside and made his way to the local supermarket.

He sighed when he saw people inside, "Oh well" he said as he blew the side of the store open and walked inside. He made his way down the isles grabbing and eating what food looked good to him, and a little extra to take home. "Darn" he mumbled threw a small loaf of bread when he sensed Renamon again. Most of his wounds were fully healed, as he healed faster than most renamons, he dropped his food as a partially bandaged Renamon rounded the corner and starred at him.

"You should go home and rest" he said with a smile as Renamon stumbled a bit while she charged him. "Take this" she yelled as she swung at him, he sighed and dodged it easily as she hit the ground. "I wonder where Rika is" he thought as Renamon struggled to get up. She coughed and fell over in pain, "go home" he yelled at her as he began to walk away. "Not...done...yet" she groaned as she forced herself up, "she's gonna kill herself if she doesn’t stop" he thought as she tried to swing again. He caught her as she fell over and smiled as he lifted her into his arms, "you need to rest" he said to her as he teleported outside and made his way back home.
1111111112221.title: House and food (hahaha)

11111111122211.content:
Renamon groaned as she slowly opened her eyes, she didn't know where she was nor did she remember anything after falling into that red two tailed renamon's arms. She sat up slowly and looked around; she saw her body was almost fully bandaged from head to toe. She looked over and saw the red renamon sitting in a chair asleep. "Did he watch over me all night" Renamon thought as she tried to get up, she ended up groaning and falling backwards back onto the bed.

Reddmon was awake when she attempted to move but didn't say anything until she actually got out of the bed. "Where you going" he said with a smirk as Renamon walked past him. She gasped and looked at him as if he was going to attack her; he stood up and moved her back over to the bed. "You still need to rest" he said as he sat her on the bed, with that he turned and left the room.

"What am I doing" he thought as he closed the door, he walked a few feet and then sat on the floor. "Why am I helping her" he thought as he rubbed his head, trying to find a reason. "She tried to kill me and I'm pretty sure she still wants to" he said to himself as he lay on the floor staring at the ceiling. "Go back to bed" he yelled when he heard her walking around, he sighed and sat up. He went downstairs and curled up on the couch, "maybe I'll feel better later" he thought as he drifted into sleep.
11111111122211.title: Renamon wakes up.

111111111222111.content:
"I have to get out of her" Renamon thought as she pushed the door open slightly, "I don't know what he's planning but I don't want to be around for it". She looked around to make sure the coast was clear before she left; her whole body ached as she walked down the stairs. She froze in her tracks when she saw him on the couch, she didn't move for a minute until he mumbled and tossed a bit.

"Good he's asleep" she thought as she moved toward the door....
111111111222111.title: Renamon runs off

1111111112221112.content:
"No..." Renamon mumbled as she opened the door to see a large conglomeration of items (it doesn't matter what’s in it, it's a bloody closet) fall toward her. Large crashing noises were heard as Renamon did her best to stop things from falling over. Renamons head quickly looked in the direction of the red renamon, who was sitting up looking at her with an angry look. Renamon darted away from him as best she could, but in her current state only got a few feet before he grabbed her. "Didn't I say you needed to rest" he said as he lifted her up and took her back upstairs.

Renamon screamed and kicked the entire way up the stairs, making it hard for Reddmon to carry her. "Will....you....stop" he groaned as Renamon swung at him again. He kicked the door open and dropped her on the bed, "I'm trying to be nice and you rip my face off" he said as he walked out of the room "Oh and my name's Reddmon" he said as he slammed the door.

"Stupid...." he groaned as he rubbed his muzzle while sitting in front of the door to make sure she didn't get back out. Reddmon sighed as he closed his eyes and felt everything around him (one of those see without seeing hear without hearing things). Renamon was paced in the room for about an hour before she finally curled up in bed. "Now stay there" he mumbled as he passed out.
1111111112221112.title: Uh oh

11111111122211121.content:
"It's not like I can go anywhere" Renamon grumbled as she thought of possible escape routes in the house. Reddmon was sitting in front of the door, she was pretty sure he was asleep, but couldn't risk moving past him. She was too weak to jump out the window or she would have done that a while ago. She pulled the pillow closer, it acting as a substitute for when she sleeps with Rika. She grumbled as she lay there, upset about being carried back up the stairs like that, she didn't like being handled that way.

She sighed as she rolled onto her back, looking up at the ceiling. "What's this feeling" she asked herself, as this strange feeling continued to come over her as she thought about him. "No no no" she grumbled as she shook her head, she couldn't like him, he's a jerk. She held the pillow tighter as she lay on her back, trying not to think about him, she sighed as she flipped the pillow underneath her head and plopped down.

-------------------
That morning
-------------------

Renamon opened her eyes to the smell of something cooking, "that smells good" she thought to herself as she tried to sit up. She looked over when she heard the door open and saw Reddmon standing there with a tray in his hands. "You gonna be good today" he asked as he walked over and set the tray up on her lap. She just stared at him as he walked out; when the door closed she almost immediately dug into the food. Renamon couldn't help herself; she hadn't eaten in almost two days, so this food would have to suffice until she got out of here.

She smiled as she patted her now full belly, "that was actually pretty good" she said to herself as the door opened back up. She looked over to see Reddmon with a first aid kit in his hand, "lay back" he said as he pushed her onto her back. "Don't push me around" Renamon yelled as she sat up, he pushed her back again and said "I'm trying to help you". "I don't need you help" she growled as she jumped off the bed and got ready to fight him, "yes you do, look you can hardly stand" he growled back as he grabbed her and tried to push her back onto the bed.

They were both growling and trying to fight each other until Renamon lost her balance and fell on top of him.

LOUD KISSING NOISE!!!!!

(If they didn't have fur I'm pretty sure both of there faces would be beet red).

Both of them sat there for a second as they accidentally kissed each other, the next second both were up and facing away from each other. "Ummm here's the first aid kit" Reddmon said as he sat it down next to her and ran off. Renamon sat there for a second before redressing her wounds, "that was awkward" she thought as she finished rebandaging herself.

I just wanted to make sure you were okay after that kick i gave you.". "Awwww I didn't know you cared" Reddmon said. "Actualy I don't I just couldn't have you being beaten by someone before I could get the chance to" Renamon said. "Oh yah right, I know you find me irresistable" Reddmon replied. "Jerk" Renamon yelled at him. "Meanie" he replied in a little kiddish voice. At that Rika burst out laughing and the conversation that was going on between Renamon and this (from Rika's pov) red two tailed Renamon. "Whats so funny Rika?" Renamon asked with an edge to her voice."Well it's pretty obvious he likes you and it seems you are just too nervous to admit you like him, plus you guys don't get to see how funny it it watching you guys arguing" Rika replied.

"Thats it, its time for you to go into the pool" Renamon said, advancing on Rika. " Hey... But.... Aaaahhh!!!" Rika cried out as Renamon grabbed her and threw her in the pool with a splash. suddenly Reddmon came up behind Renamon and pushed her in after Rika. "So thats how its gonna be huh" Renamon declared looking at Reddmon who has a huge grin on his face. She swam up and grabbed Reddmon by his legs and dragged him in, unfortunately he fell over while being pulled in and hit his head on the concrete just before being dragged into the water

Reddmons pov...

'ouch' he thought as his head hit the ground. Faking being knocked out again he let himself sink to the bottom of the pool, causing Renamon to freak out thinking she may have pulled him to hard. Suddenly, just as Renamon got over to him, he grabs her ankle and pulls her down under. As they both surfaced they noticed Rika standing by the edge, soaking wet, laughing. With a quick glance and a smile between Renamon and Reddmon they both teleported behind Rika and picked her up and threw her in again. As Rika got out Reddmon and Renamon were both laughing. "Here" He offered handing Rika and Renamon a pair of towels. "Well its been fun but you guys should get going" Reddmon said "And besides i have 'somewhere' I have to be". "Don't be getting into any trouble" Renamon warned "Or i might have to come after you, and i can't be blamed for what Takato, Guilmon, Henry or Terriermon do if you get caught". "Me, cause trouble, never"Reddmon replied giving his most innocent look to the girls, causing them both to start laughing. He then teleported off leaving Renamon and Rika by the pool.

Renamons pov....

"Renamon lets head back" Rika said "I need to get into some dry clothes anyway". "So what made you say i liked him?" Renamon asked on the way back to Rika's house. "Well it was pretty obvious and I knew you wouldn't admit it no mater what, so i felt like giving you some 'encouragement' ". "Oh, okay" Renamon replied. 'i knew i shouldn't have brought her along' she thought. "so you know his name?" Rika asked. "Aparently its Reddmon". "okay" Rika said as they got to her house.
11111111122211121121112.title: Awwww she cares.... NOT!!! .....Right?

Redd decides to sit.....

During class....

choices: Renamon decides to pay Reddmon a "visit"
11111111122211121121112122.content:
During the tour....

BOOOOM!!!!!
A large explosion rips through a nearby building. "Redd you should get out of here, it might not be safe" Takato tells Redd. "What about you?" Redd asks. "I'll be fine" he replies. "Okay" Redd says somewhat sarcastically.'He probably doesn't know i know he is a tamer' Redd thought as he headed away from Takato and the explosion. After rounding a corner into a dark alley he transformed back into Reddmon and jumped up on the building. Several minutes later Renamon and Rika arrive accompanied by guilmon, who meet up with Takato. 'this is gonna be fun' Reddmon thought, as he hopped down a fair distance behind the group. He then proceded sneaking up behind them until he was a few meters/yards away."Hey guys hows it going?"Reddmon asked. All four of them whip around and Renamon gave him a punch before she recognized him. "Ouch, what was that for" Reddmon complained to Renamon as she moved away. "That was for sneaking up on us, jerk" Renamon replied. "A friend of yours?"takato whispered to Rika, who gave a nod in response."Anyway i thought you guys could use some help so i decided to stop by" Reddmon said. "Lets just get this over with" Renamon muttered to herself

After the fight....(Yah so im not going to describe it)

"Thanks for the help.... uh"Takato said. "Its Reddmon" Reddmon supplied. "Yah well thanks again for the help" "Well I couldn't let Renamon have all the fun"Reddmon said, shooting Renamon a glance that almost made her attack him. "You should probably get going, if i Remember correctly you have somewhere to be soon" Renamon said to Reddmon in a voice that barely concealed the threatening tone beneath it. "I guess so" Reddmon replied "Oh before i go feel free to stop by if your ever 'bored' ", and with a wicked looking grin he was off.

Later....

"So how did you two meet that guy?" Takato asked. "You don't really want to know" They both replied."Really"he said rolling his eyes, "guess I'll just have to ask him the next time I see him". "Do it and you will be stuck in bed for a week" Rika said, clenching her fist to further enforce her point. "Well see ya later" Takato said as they arrive by his parents bakery. The rest of the trip home is uneventfull.
11111111122211121121112122.title: A digimon atacks them

111111111222111211211121221.content:
That night....

Glancing at the clock, Renamon decided it was time to go. Slipping out the window, so as not to wake Rika, she sets off toward Reddmons "house". "HEYA" Reddmon called out as he saw Renamon coming. "You feeling up for a round or two?"Renamon asked. "You should know i'm always ready" He replied "Lets head around back, more room there". "Is that really the reason you want to fight back there or is it because of the pool?"Renamon asked. Giving a surprised look, Reddmon replies "Are you saying that there is no way i could win without cheating!". "Well lets just see" She replied.
111111111222111211211121221.title: Renamon decides to pay Reddmon a "visit"

1111111112221112112111212211.content:
'Like hell i won't cheat' Reddmon thought to himself, a grin apearing on his face. When they got around back, Reddmon sais to Renamon "Ladies first". Renamon procedes to teleport behing Reddmon and was going to give him a kick in the back of the head, but he ducked under it and turned and countered with an uppercut, wich she promptly dodged by jumping back.
After 15 minutes of fighting with neither side seeming to get an advanage, Reddmon decides to, for lack of a fancy way to say it, cheat. Leaning over while they both were in an armlock he gave her a kiss and released his grip and jumped back, expecting her to get realy pissed off at him. Instead of her getting really pissed she seems to almost blush a bit before coming back at him just like before.
'Damn that was weird' Reddmon thought, dodging another of Renamons blows 'i could have sworn she would have come at me like she was going to kill me'. Noticing the positions they were in relative to the pool, he maneuvers so that he is between Renamon and the pool. "Come on is that all you got"Reddmon called at Renamon, which made her come at him full speed. With a quick movement he dodged her rush and came up behind her and proceded to push her in the pool.
SPLASH!!!!!
"So you had to resort to cheating to have any chance at winning" Renamon called out at him. "Hey I never said i wouldn't cheat, and besides i thought you knew me better than that" Reddmon called back.
"Is that so" Renamon muttered to herself
1111111112221112112111212211.title: like he would play fair.

11111111122211121121112122111.content:
"Thats it, he is going down" Renamon muttered to herself while pulling herself out of the pool. running at him she tried a few punches, which he blocked and then got him in a hand grapple. during the grapple she leaned over and gave him a quick kiss on the cheek(yah so im not going to make her come out more yet). Suddenly Reddmons eyes unfocused and his brain seemed to be 'elsewhere'.
Reddmons pov...
'That got her mad' He thought as he watched Renamon pull herself out of the pool. Upon climbing out Renamon charged him and threw several punches, which he blocked, when she suddenly leaned over and kissed him. '!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!' Reddmons mind was going off with crazy and incoherent thoughts 'What just happened!!!!!!!'. suddenly he was reeling over with pain.
Renamons pov....
Noticing Reddmons vacant look and obvious lack of coherent motor skills Renamon gives him a hard kick in the gut, followed by a fist to the forehead, knocking him over. walking over she puts her foot on his chest. "Give up?"Renamon asked. "..................................." Reddmon replied his mind still lost in thought. "Guess il have to take that as a yes" She said, as she walks away.

Half an hour later....
"....................WHAT THE HELL JUST HAPPENED!!!!!!!!!!!" Reddmon yelled out, pacing around the house. "Ah screw it i'll figure it out later" HE muttered heading to get a few hours sleep before morning.

THUD

"Ouch, that was not nice you know" He called out to her, while picking himself up from off the ground. "Why do you think I did it" She called back "And besides giving the cops a wild goose chase is'nt nice either". "Yah but it is fun" Reddmon replied.

11111111122211121121112122111122111.content:
Turning to face Reddmon, Renamon launched herself at him catching him by surprise. As they fell over she latched her lips to his and gave him a deep long kiss. It lasted the whole time they rolled down the conveniently placed hillside until they reached the bottom. "That answer your question?" Renamon asked pushing herself up off of Reddmon who ended up at the bottom of the two. Reddmon just sat there with a stunned look on his face and in he wasn't red, he would have turned red anyway.

Standing up Renamon watched Reddmon come out of his stupor and try and get up. "So i'll take that as a yes?" Reddmon said once he could talk. Renamon just laughed and pulled him in and gave him another kiss, shorter this time. Upon breaking away Reddmon said with a smile on his face "Deffinely a yes".

They spend the afternoon together, doing whatever you imagine. it starts getting dark out when ...
11111111122211121121112122111122111.title: Yes

111111111222111211211121221111221111.content:
The moon was full, the stars were out, it was a perfectly clear night as the two lay side by side in the park. Reddmon looked over at Renamon bathed in the light of the moon, giving her the appearance of a faint glow. 'So beautiful' He thought. Turning back to the stars he gave a sigh. At this Renamon turned to him and asked "Whats wrong?", to which he made no reply, lost in thought. 'if only this night could last forever' Reddmon thought. Renamon sensing his mood, turned back to the stars and shifted closer to him. Feeling her shift over he turned to her with a faint smile on his lips. She turned to him as well when they suddenly heard someone call out "RENAMON!!!". 'So much for this night lasting forever' Reddmon though getting up. "I should get out of here Renamon, I don't know how they would react seeing us together like this" He said helping Renamon up. Renamon gave a sigh and replied "I suppose your right, But when will I see you again?". they heard the call again, this time it was was closer so Reddmon began to leave but Renamon grabbed his arm and said "Be careful okay" before letting go. He gave a quick nod before disapearing into the night, leaving her to stand there looking after him.

"There you are!" Rika yelled coming into sight, "what are you doing out here!". "It was such a perfect night i didn't feel like wasting it" Renamon replied tuning to leave with Rika. On the walk home Rika asked "Were you with Reddmon tonight?". Surprised as she was Renamon managed to keep from giving any hint of surprise as she relpied "No, Why would I be with that jerk". "Good, He is a bad influence on you, and I don't want you doing something you, and I will regret" Rika said. 'shows what she knows' Renamon thought, just then they arrived at Rika's house and went to bed, Renamon sleeping on the balcony just outside of Rika's room. Just before she fell asleep Renamon noticed a shadow flicker overhead and a solitary yellow rose fall and land beside her. Smiling she went to sleep.




(ps. I honestly cant believe i just wrote this chapter)
111111111222111211211121221111221111.title: Nearly perfect end to a nearly perfect day

1111111112221112112111212211112211111.content:
Yawning, Renamon got up, the sun just peeking over the edge of the horizon. Looking at the rose beside her she notices a note attached to it. It reads "12:30 at the park". Realizing that this was an answer to her question last night she shreds the note so Rika doesn't find out. Tuning she looked through the glass door to see Rika still asleep. Grabbing the rose she jumped off in the direction of Reddmons house. Upon arrival about 10 minutes later Renamon notices that no one is home. This brought a question to her mind 'why isn't he here right now?, it isn't that early'. quickly heading off to the nearest flower shop she grabs a red rose and ties it to her yellow one and attaches a note saying 'Its a date' on it and attaching it to the front door of his house. Just as quickly as she had came she left back for Rika's house hoping that Rika was still asleep. When she got there and Rika was still asleep so she settled down outside on the porch.

~~~~Meanwhile~~~~

Jumping from store to store, Reddmon was filling a basket with food, hoping to get everything he needed before the stores opened(for those who haven't figured it out yet its a picnic). After his last stop he sent the basket to his alternate dimension storage thing(see second chapter), and headed home to get a bit of rest. Upon arriving at his home he notices the roses attached to the front door and the note along with it. Smiling he pulled them of the door and went inside for a nap.
1111111112221112112111212211112211111.title: The next day

11111111122211121121112122111122111111.content:
Glancing at his watch Reddmon is hurrying to the park(Yah he has a watch so what). At the same time Renamon is heading to the park for her date with Reddmon. Both of them unaware that a Digital field has appeared in the park which draws Rika and the other tamers to the same park. It doesn't take a genius to guess what time they will arrive. Somehow all three groups manage to enter in different entrances. Okay well Reddmon and Renamon don't need entrances but whatever. Upon entering the park Reddmon sensed the digital field FINALLY. Dropping the basket he hurries toward it with an increased speed. at the same time Renamon arrives to the same conclusion. The tamers are still behind the other two when they meet. "Looks like we'll have to postpone our date for now" Reddmon said. "Pity, i was looking forward to it"Renamon sighed "You should get out of here before the others arrive, it wouldn't do for them to see us together". "I suppose" Reddmon muttered turning to leave " come by my place later today okay"."Deal" Renamon replied.

On his way out Reddmon forgot the basket he had prepared. He didn't realise this till he got home and it may have been too late. Back at the park The tamers were just leaving when they passed by the area where Reddmon had dropped the basket. The question is do they notice it and start getting suspitions about Renamon and Reddmon?
11111111122211121121112122111122111111.title: Karma with a capital K

111111111222111211211121221111221111111.content:
"Hey whats that?" Takato called out pointing to the basket, which is half concealed by a bush.
"I dunno, looks like a basket" Said Henry unintrested.
"You guys go ahead, I want to take a look at it" Rika said before heading toward the basket, being the only one with an idea about Renamon and Reddmon and their possible(Okay real) relationship.
"Whats up Rika? something like a lost basket wouldn't normaly interest you" Takato asked.
Still involved in examining the basket she doesn't realise what she is saying when she sais "I believe Renamon is having a relationship with anoher digimon".
At this the others eyes bulged out in complete shock. (The others meaning everyone but Renamon who had left already)
"Are you sure" Takato and Henry blurt out unable to contain their surprise.
"Huh?" Rika said turning around having found no clues on the basket and seeing their surprised faces.
"you were saying you believed Renamon is having a relationship with anoher digimon".
"Shoot did I say that out loud"
"Yep, why?"
Glancing around to make sure they were alone she said "I didn't want anyone to know about it, expecialy you guys figuring how you might react".
"Well now thats out what do we do about it?"
111111111222111211211121221111221111111.title: Suspitions

1111111112221112112111212211112211111111.content:
After Rika's retelling of the events so far as she knew of them the group gets together to figure out what to do.
"Why cant we just follow them to so if they meet each other?" Takato asks.
"Several reasons" Rika said "Firstly there is no way we could keep up with either one of them, and besides they would probably be able to sense us following. And even if we could follow undetected we may not be able to get to every place they may go. Lastly imagine if they caught us following them".
They sat there pondering this for a while trying to find a soloution.

~Meanwhile At Reddmons House~

What an onlooker would see is a red blur streaming around the house cleaning at hyperspeed (that being the card he used to acomplish this much), dust flying everwhere and water flying. As Reddmon finishes the first floor he heads upstairs unaware that renamon was comming in a second story window in a bedroom. She comes in and opens the door unaware Reddmon is about to head into that room.

CRASH!!!

Reddmon goes flying into Renamon were they both procede to go flying out the window do to the immense ammount of momentum, and they land ONCE AGAIN in the pool. "Deja vu much?" Reddmon said as they surfaced.Renamon just laughed and hugged and kissed him. After about 15 minutes of "playing" in the pool, they get out and head inside to dry off.

~Back with the Tamers~

"Wait, you said you were at his house at one time, Right?" Henry asked Rika.
"Yeah" Rika replied "Why?".
"If we can't watch them why don't we watch where they are most likely to be together"
"Thats a great idea" Rika and Takato said together,"But what about at night?".
"I have a few night vision camera's so they should do" Henry replied.
"So thats how we'll watch them" They agreed.
1111111112221112112111212211112211111111.title: Problems and Solutions.

111111111222111211212.content:
After an hour or so Reddmon comes to. As he pushes himself up he looks round for any sign of Renamon. Spotting a thin trail of blood he leaps to his feet and curses "Damn she must have opened a wound when she knocked me out." Then he is hit by a bout of vertigo and immediately falls over again. Shaking his head he mutters "I've gotta stop letting her hit my in the head." to himself as he groggily stands and runs off along the trail of blood.

Renamon lent against the wall of an alley for support, panting heavily. She'd finally escaped that cursed Reddmon. As she thinks of him she remembers the first time they'd met, the jerk had lent in for a kiss mid battle, the strange thing was she couldn't keep up any anger towards him. Pushing of the wall she sighed "I've got to get him out of my head."

"Who's this? Do I have a rival in the war of love?" An all to familiar voice whispered close behind her. "Damn its him." she muttered to herself. Suddenly further along the alley a large ball of fire streaked from the sky slamming into the ground raising a thick cloud of dirt and powered concrete. Behind her Reddmon groaned "Damn not him." Renamon glanced behind her, if Reddmon thought this guy was a pain he was probably going to be big trouble "Who is it?". Reddmon sighed "His names Orionmon, his kind of a rival, of combat not love of course."

As he spoke the dust settled revealing a large humanoid digimon with heavy looking steal plates seemingly riveted to his body. On his arms a pair of spikes where set into steal casings and judging by there size they could extend a good half meter. As he stood up he looked down the alley towards them his pale green eyes drilling into Reddmon. He stepped out of the small crater his arrival had created and walked towards them.

He pulled his shoulders back slightly and chuckled loudly. "About time I found you Reddmon. I was worried he might get to you first." Reddmon stepped forward slightly putting himself between her and Orionmon. Renamon frowned slightly, it seamed like a unconscious action. Did he really care about her? "What do you mean, its not like you to announce your presence like this?" Orionmon was close now, no more than a meter away. He was considerably larger than Reddmon though his stance and demeanor were not threatening. "Reddmon, someones after you. Rival or not I still consider you a friend of sorts."

Reddmon stood up a little straighter and crossed his arms in front of his chest. "You really consider me a friend? Well thats nice, wait what do you mean someones after me." Behind her Renamon heard a sound like ripping fabric. They all looked towards the source of the noise to see a large black digimon seeming to claw through the fabric of the air. The digimon had two sets of ragged red wings folded behind him and large patches of a translucent material on his head and legs revealing circuitry of sorts.

Orionmon pointed towards him and simply said "Him. We should go." He motioned behind him and a large black hole opened from nowhere. He gently pushed them both behind him, towards the hole "Quickly Go." He whispered urgently as the mystery digimon started to gather energy within its claws. Reddmon and Renamon didn't need to be told twice and dived through the hole. Once they where through Orionmon jumped backwards through the gap closing it after him.

As Renamon tumbles through the darkness she started to lose consciousness, the last thing she sensed was a warm prescience rapping its arms around her and embracing her, almost, protecting her. She caught a glimpse or red then blacked out.
111111111222111211212.title: Reddmons pov (after he comes to)..

choices: Wait for Reddmon to wake up.
1111111112221112112121.content:
Renamon awoke to the sound of trees swaying in the breeze. She pushed herself up looking round, the first thing she noticed was Reddmon lying next to her. Clean bandages wrapped around his hear. The next thing she noticed was that her own dressings had been changed and by the looks of it they had been done professionally, opposed to the rather haphazard job Reddmon had done. "Ah, you awake good." Renamon looked in the direction of the noise to see Orionmon sitting on a log. putting the book he was holding down he stood up and walked over to her, bending down and offering her his hand.

Taking the offered hand and letting Orionmon help her up, looking around she found she was in the clearing of what appeared to be an utterly serene forest. "What happened? And were are we and what happened to Reddmon?" Orionmon looked up and rubbed the back of his head with his hand. "Well for the fist and last question, the trip here didn't seem to agree with you, probably to do with your wounds. Well as you were falling Reddmon grabbed you and fell first he took a bad knock to the head but a bit of rest and he should be fine. And before you yell at me I was to busy keeping the path clear." Renamon frowned that explained how they got here but. "So who was that other digimon?" Orionmon glanced worriedly towards Reddmon then refocused on her. "A digimon named Cyberdramon is trying to deleting virus digimon. I found out that Reddmon was his next target, so I rushed over and saved him. And here we are. And lastly, were in a safe place that no one but me can enter and exit. I call it my sanctuary but you can call it whatever you want."

Renemon sighed to herself. she was hungry and still a bit sore. As if reading her mind Orionmon motioned towards the tree line. "If you want food or water there is a fridge over there. And I can fetch anything else you need." Renemon glanced over at Reddmon. "Don't worry i'll keep watching him, come back when you get some food." Renamon nodded then walked in the motioned direction.

She pushed beside a branch to reveal a fridge oven and several kitchen appliances all plugged into a tree. Renamon opened the fridge, inside was a variety of fruits and meats, she picked a piece of pork an orange and a small bottle of water then closed the door behind her. As she reentered the clearing Orionmon motioned for her to come over and sit next to him. Swallowing the mouthful she was chewing she sat next to him. "What's wrong?"
"I've got to go and sort some stuff out, gather some intel and what not. Could you watch over him and explain everything to him if he wakes up?" Renamon frowned "What exactly is going on?"

"As I said Cyberdramon is deleting virus type digimon. This not only includes Reddmon but Guilmon as well. As far as I can tell he can only be defeated if the digidestined, Reddmon and myself work together. So i'm keeping you both safe while you recuperate." He reached behind his back and pulled out a laptop computer. "Here, use this to contact Rika and the others and explain everything to them. I'll be back later." With that Orionmon turned and created another portal. But before he stepped through he paused and looked back "Hey Renamon your not sure about your feelings for Reddmon are you. Well I think really cares for you. Try hiding and watching when he wakes up, see what he does." And with that he left.

"What?" Renamon asked but the hole had already closed. She looked back toward Reddmon. "Do I really like this guy?" From the first time they'd met to now he'd changed a lot. And he seemed to becoming protective of her. Renamon began absentmindedly peeling the orange.

What should she do know.
1111111112221112112121.title: Orionmon's sanctuary.

choices: Renamons POV. Renamon asks about him.
11111111122211121121211.content:
As she waited for Reddmon to come round Renamon decided to to take a look at the area. Teleporting to the top of a tree Renamon was surprised to see that the ocean of green was seemingly endless. The sky and the trees met on the horizon, no hills or other changes in the terrain. Looking around Renamon noticed that one of the trees nearby had a strange blemish on its trunk. Curious Renamon jumped over to have a look and found that the blemish was in fact a handle. Renamon gripped it tightly and yanked it open. Inside the tree proved to be hollowed out and filled with everything from medical supplies to a folded up tent. Rummaging through the medical supplies Renamon found some mild painkillers. She took out few tablets and chuckled to herself "Reddmon would probably want these when he wakes up." she said to herself, then closed the door again. Glancing around Renamon noticed quite a few trees had similar handles.

Deciding to check on Reddmon again Renamon hopped from tree to tree until she reached the edge of the clearing. Crouching on a branch Renamon looked down at him, laying alone in the clearing. She realized just how little she knew about him. Besides his name and a bit about his personality he was a stranger to her. Maybe she could talk to Orionmon, they seemed to know each other pretty well. Maybe he was alone in the world. That could explain all the trouble he gets into. She had Rika and the other digidestined, her comrades and friends. Who did Reddmon have?

Her thoughts were interrupted as Reddmon rolled over and slowly pushed himself up.

Reddmon's POV

Reddmon pushed himself up and rubbed his head, a pounding headache causing him to stumble. As the ground rushed up towards him Reddmon closed his eyes and braced for it. Not able to react properly. But instead he felt someone catch him under the arms. He opened his eyes to see Renamon grinning at him. He smiled back at her and regained his balance, steadying himself on her shoulder. "Thanks." She nodded and led him over to a log at the edge of the clearing they were in then helped him sit down. "Uugh. So were in Orionmon place right? Where is he?" Renamon nodded "Yes, he went off somewhere. He said he would be back soon." She glanced around. "Have you been hear before?" Reddmon looked up at the sky "Yeah, three times. Usually its like this, peaceful and serene but once it was pretty freaky. Everything was dead and rotting. I think it might reflect his mind or something. Not sure what was wrong with him. But anyway are you ok?" He glanced at her, the bandages covering her injuries had been changed, probably by Orionmon.

"Yes thank you. But why did you save me?" Reddmon felt a sudden flush of heat rise to his face. Why did he save her? "Err, sorry i've got to find some medicine. My heads killing me." Reddmon got up and started to walk towards one of the nearby trees trying to inconspicuously hide his face from her.
"Oh wait, Reddmon, I found some in one of the trees." Damn! Reddmon thought to himself, then turned around to see her holding out a pair of tablets. He smiled hoping his fur would mask the blush. "Thanks." He took the tablets and swallowed them then sat down again, feeling awkward and uncomfortable. "Any idea who that black digimon was?" Renamon frowned. "Yeah, Orionmon said his name was Cyberdramon and he was trying to delete you and any other Virus digimon." Reddmon looked at Renamon, she was clasping her hands in front of her, staring worriedly at them. Reddmon groaned mentally. He had no idea what to do, women weren't his strong point.

He slowly slid over next to her and put his hand on her shoulder. As he made contact she twitched slightly. Not a good sign but he pressed onward anyway. "Hey, if your worried about Guilmon, he is a virus digimon right? Don't worry he's tough and he has the other digimon to help him. C'mon Orionmon must have a computer around here somewhere." He looked around and spotted a laptop next to a tree and got up to fetch it. As he sat down again Renamon laughed "Oh yeah Orionmon left that for me. I had completely forgotten about it. I'd better tell Rika and the others where we are." As she took the laptop and turned it on Reddmon smiled. "I think telling them your with me might only make them more worried." Renamon smiled back and Reddmon sighed in relief. "That smile looks good on you." She looked at him in a strange way, then her smile widened. Reddmon decided to push it further. "At least i'm not kissing you without you permission..." His witty remark was cut off as her lips touched his. For several seconds they kissed Reddmon thoroughly confused but still enjoying it.

She pulled back blushing profusely and after a few seconds Reddmon snapped out of the slight daze he was in and rubbed the back of his head. "I guess I had that coming from before." Renamon laughed softly then looked into his eyes. Seeming to see something inside him. "Reddmon...
11111111122211121121211.title: Wait for Reddmon to wake up.

111111111222111211212111.content:
Just then a female voice made them both look away towards the edge of the clearing. "That sounds like Rika." Renamon remarked.
Reddmon shrugged "Orionmon must have brought them here for some reason." They both stood up as Orionmon emerged into the clearing, leaning heavily against a tree and holding a bleeding wound on his side. Shortly after him Rika, Takato, Henry appeared as well as Guilmon and Terriermon.

As they entered the clearing they each had hugley different reactions. Takato and Guilmon switched to offensive stances and prepared to attack him, Rika looked worried and asked Renamon "What are you doing here, with him." pointing towards Reddmon, while Henry and Terriermon just looked around slightly confused by all this.

Then suddenly Guilmon growled and charged forward. Orionmon called out after him. "Guilmon! Stop! He's in the same situation as you are." Guilmon slid to a halt and cocked his head staring straight at Reddmon. "What do you mean?" Orionmon walked over to a tree and dropped himself down against it. Grunting in pain as he did so. "Renamon would be be able to get me my medical supplies. Their in that..." Renamon teleported over to a tree and opened it retrieving a box from within it and jumping over next to him "Sorry I noticed the handles earlier and got Reddmon some painkillers." Orionmon just nodded "Thank you. Would you be able to open it up take out a thread and needle and sew the wound shut?" Renamon shook her head "You sure. I don't have much medical knowledge." Orionmon nodded "I just need it closed so it can heal properly. Anyway, Guilmon do you remember that black digimon?" Guilmon sat down nodding "Yeah, what did he want anyway?" Orionmon motioned for everyone to sit down as Renamon poured some antiseptic liquid on his wound and began preparing the needle and thread.

"I guess I should explain everything so everyone is up to speed. First off the black digimon is called Cyberdramon. He's a renegade digimon on a mission to systematically delete all virus digimon. He always has a primary and secondary target. Currently thats Reddmon and Guilmon respectively. Because Reddmon was here, where Cyberdramon couldn't access, he switched to finding Guilmon. He just happened to find you when you all had gathered to talk about Ranamon's absence. I intervened and we escaped here." Henry raised his hand, as if he was in class. Orionmon smiled and nodded to him. "But you were able to stop him. Why didn't you just defeat him there and then?" Orionmon chuckled a little then winced as Renamon
threaded the needle through again. "Distracting a superior enemy is different from defeating him. Much longer and he would have beaten me into the
dirt. "

Renamon finished sewing him up and cut the string with a pair of scissors from the kit. As she she put the supplies back in the box Orionmon thanked her and she went to replace the box in the tree. As she returned and sat back down next to Reddmon, something everyone noticed, especially Reddmon. Guilmon raised his hand. "So why are you helping Reddmon? I mean he's a jerk." Takato nodded his arms crossed. Again Orionmon chuckled as Reddmon tensed his paw slightly ready to beat up this punk again. "Trust me thats mainly bravado. He's more or less a decent sort. He's just a bit, how should I put this, brash. And anyway I have known him for a while now, we met at a tournament. Which he won, knocking me out for a day or two, when I came round he was at my bedside gloating straight off the bat. Needless to say the hospital staff weren't too pleased about the hole that Reddmon made in the wall." Reddmon frowned halfheartedly, he remembered that day. "That was only because you threw me at it." Everyone laughed including Renamon, who giggled and put her hand on Reddmon's shoulder.

Orionmon continued "But after that we more or less settled into the position of rivals, fighting every know and again, with a roughly equal record. eventually I guess we just became friends. And thats why i'm here, to help a friend. So before I go any further, everyone hungry?" There was nods from most members of the group. Orionmon glanced at the sky which suddenly started to darken slightly, then groaned as he pushed himself to his feet.
"I need some firewood. Would anyone like to volunteer to cut down a tree?"
111111111222111211212111.title: An interupption.

1111111112221112112121111.content:
Rika's POV

Reddmon stood up and walked out of the clearing, calling behind him "I'll take care of getting fire wood." Renamon Glanced from Rika to were Reddmon left and announced to the group at large "I might as well help him." Rika smiled to herself as Renamon Ran after him she really did have a thing for him. Maybe it was the bad boy image Reddmon setup around himself. She sighed and shook her head, "Each to her own I suppose." she mumbled to her self. "Sorry what was that?" asked Takato. "Hmm, oh, nothing. Hey Orionmon can I help with anything." Orionmon cocked his head, looking at her intensely for a moment "Well until they get back with the wood there is not much we can do. Though, would you like to come help me get vegetables and meat ready?" "Yeah sure." she replied standing up and following him out. "Oh and everyone else feel free to look around. Theres all sorts of interesting things within the trees." As she followed him she couldn't help but wonder, why store things in the trees?

As she followed Orionmon through the trees to another clearing she was suprised to see that he had a full kitchen with oven and even a sink. as Orionmon opened the fridge and rummaged through it, pulling different things from inside. "Hold it a minute. Orionmon," he stopped and poked his head over the door "Yes Rika is there something you want?" "Why do you need firewood when you have a stove?" He just shrugged and went back to looking for stuff in the fridge. "I just thinks its more fun to cook by a wood fire." What a strange guy. Rika thought to her self "would you be able to get a pair of knives and cutting boards from that cupboard, as well as a large metal bowl from that shelf." Pointing to the corresponding locations. Rika walked over to the cupboard he pointed to and opened it. In side she found a weird assortment of cooking knives, cutting boards and weaponry that seemed to go from medieval to current day. Again Rika felt a bit worried about this guy. She grabbed a pair of knives an two large cutting boards then put then on the table top. then reached up and got a bowl from a shelf attached to a tree trunk.

Orionmon closed the fridge and took the bowl from her putting an large chuck of some sort of meat in it and sweeping the rest of the food into it as well. "Any particular type of curry you like Rika?" He asked opening another cupboard while holding the bowl in one hand. This cupboard was filled with all sorts of condiments and spices. "Red curry I guess. So you cook a lot?" Oriomon nods and takes out the mentioned curry. "Yes that's one of the big difference between me and Reddmon. He can't cook for himself so he usually just steals food. Kind of sad really. Could you bring the knives and board?"
He put the curry powder in the bowl and walked back towards the other clearing.

As they entered the clearing Reka noticed that Takato and the others had dug a hole and surrounded it with rocks as well as set up a collapsible table nearby. Orionmon put the things he was holding on the table and Rika put the knives and board next to it. Orionmon walked over to the fire pitt and gave it a quick inspection. "It's a good job. Seems like some one has gone camping before. And thanks for getting out the table. Good thinking." Orionmon nodded towards Takato and Henry who were in a tree going through another cabinet. "Thanks. We found some sleeping bags as well. Do want them out." Henry called holding up a large green bag. "Yes, you might as well get them out now."

Orionmon busied himself setting out the ingredients while Rika helped the boys get all the sleeping bags down. Once they were all down Rika noticed there was only seven of them. "Hey, Orionmon were on sleeping bag short. Will that be ok?" "Yes, I usually don't sleep on the ground at all, let alone on a bed of any kind. Why, those are brand new. So does anyone know where Guilmon and Terriermon got to?" Takato lowered himself down from the tree. "Yeah, they said they were going to explore the forest." Orionmon chuckled as he began peeling and chopping vegetables with a deftness that was quite surprising. "Their probably hopelessly lost by now so once Renamon and Reddmon come back i'll go find them." when finished with one vegetable he would put it in the large bowl and begin on the next one. Takato sat down on a log and Henry laid down resting his head on the log next to it. "Nah Guilmons got a good sense of smell and Terriermons got an excellent sense of direction. "Well that would help usually but this place is a bit different. The only reason I think Reddmon can get back on his own is that he has been here before."

"Sorry what was that." Everyone turned around to see Reddmon heavily burdened with pieces of wood and Renamon carrying one or two as well as an axe. "Ah, good, your back. I'll go find the others then." He stood up and raised his arm in and opening gesture then a black circle opened up in the air before him. Orionmon paused for a second "Could someone find a pot and boil some water then just throw the vegetables in." Henry got up and brushed himself off. "Sure i'll do it." Orionmon nodded thanks and stepped into the hole which disappeared behind him.

Renamon sat down next to Rika while Reddmon dropped the wood near the edge of the clearing and began split it into smaller pieces, throwing them into the fire pit until they had a large enough pile. Renamon and Rika watched while he went around looking for matches to light the fire. "Rika, i'm sorry if you were worried the last couple of days, but well my injuries were worse than we thought and he kind of helped me heal. I tried to come home but then all the mess with Orionmon happened." Rika scratched the back of her head. At least she was safe. "It's fine Renamon. But what are we going to do about this Cyberdramon. We can't just let him delete Guilmon." Renamon shook her head "Or Reddmon." Rika looked over at the Boys who had gotten the fire lit and were putting a large black pot over it. "It seems like they've gotten over the earlier incident at least." commented Renamon. "Yeah but Guilmons probably going to want another fight at the earliest opportunity."

At this another hole opened out of nowere and Guilmon, Terriermon and Orionmon stepped out. Rika noted that Guilmon and Terriermon looked slightly sheepish. "Sorry everyone we got a bit lost." said Terriermon. Guilmon just shrugged and went over to see what everyone was doing. Orionmon and Terriermon followed shortly after.

After a few minutes the smells of food began to waft through out the clearing. "Dinners ready!" called Guilmon happily. The whole time he had been sitting next to the pot smelling the food as it cooked. Orionmon produced a stack of plates from nowhere while Reddmon teleported away and reappeared with cutlery a moment later. The food was ladled out and every one was soon sitting around the fire eating.

"So,"coughed Henry "how are we going to deal with this?"
1111111112221112112121111.title: Reddmon and Renamon of course.

11111111122211121121211111.content:
Reddmon swallowed his mouthful of curry and put his bowl down. Crossing his arms he declared "This guys not going to stop hunting Guilmon and me till we're deleted right?" Orionmon nods. "Well that means were going to have to delete him first." Every one made noises of agreement. "But Cyberdramon is an ultimate digimon, right?" Asked Rika. "Correct," answered Orionmon "and an exceptionally strong one as well. We cant just attack him in a knock down drag out fight. Even with our combined strength he would be able to delete both his targets. We need a strong plan with backups for every contingency."

"Even if we all digivolved to ultimate form?" asked Terriermon. Orionmon nodded "Most digimon become slower when in their ultimate form, with exceptions of those like Renamon and Cyberdramon, while we might have the force to defeat him, we would lack the speed to hit him. While he would easily be able to hit us." Renamon shook her head. "Well, why don't I go ultimate and everyone else stay in champion?" Reddmon caught on as everyone else agreed. "Because that could make you the priority target. He seems to work in a systematic manner. Right Orionmon?"

Orionmon nodded "Yes, that's correct as well. What I was thinking was that we would use his programming against him. Reddmon stays in front of him drawing his attention, taking a defensive stance. While Reddmon dodges I will be moving around them both, stopping Cyberdramons attacks and counterattacking. We will both be in our rookie forms, mainly because our champion forms are a bit, how should I put this? uncontrollable? The other digimon should be hanging back making ranged attacks when ever they see an opening. The digidestined should be behind them supporting them with ability cards, and getting anyone that gets hurt away. Anyone see any problems so far?"

Guilmon raised his claw. "What if he starts attacking you or one of us?" "Then both Reddmon and myself will be able to intervene. But remember that this whole plan revolves around keeping Cyberdramon off balance. If he becomes particularly determined to hurt one of us or someone gets seriously hurt, or anything else we can't handle turns up I will have to digivolve my self."

"Sorry, why is that bad?" Asked Takato. Orionmon smiled. "Because, my champion form is a mindless killing machine with no control over his actions, if Cyberdramons weakened a bit first I might be able to defeat him. If it comes to that i'll need Reddmon and Renamon to get the destined away. Guilmon and Terriermon should be able to get escape by themselves. When you've all gotten far enough away i'll need Reddmon to come back. And if Cyberdramon isn't defeated, to save me or if he is to bring me back here, I tend to pass out after a fight. Again any more questions?"

Takato crossed his arms frowning. "Why is he attacking us anyway Orionmon?" Orionmon shrugged. "I'm not entirely sure. But it's either because he is a rouge program made from corrupted data. Or some one has sent him to delete Reddmon and Guilmon." "Who would do that?" Asked Guilmon. "I might be able to find out if we capture him, but beyond that." He shrugged. "Where would we fight him? We can't just start a fight in the real world. If what you say is true and you digivolve you could hurt some one." Noted Henry "Well somewhere around here would be the safest option."

"When do you think we should do this?" Reddmon asked. Orionmon scratched his head. "Well Renamons healed, as have you and i'm probably going to be fine after a nights sleep, so how about tomorrow morning?" Every one nodded. Orionmon stood up, picked up a few pieces of wood and tossed them on the fire. He then walked over to a tree and sat down against it. "I suppose everyone else should be fine to set them selves up." He said pointing towards the pile of sleeping bags that Rika, Takato and Henry had set up earlier, then he closed his eyes and seemed to fall asleep immediately.

Reddmon watched as everyone got up and busied themselves, unfurling the sleeping bags and laying them down near the fire. Reddmon felt slightly uneasy, during the recent events everyone had started to accept him, Guilmon sometimes gave him sideways glances but beyond that, they seemed to be beginning to like him. He wasn't quite sure what to make of that, Orionmon was the only real friend he could remember. It was nice to be around people who liked him. He especially liked being close to Renamon. But what about when they had defeated Cyberdramon would they still let him hang around? Reddmon got up and started to walk out of the clearing. "Hey Reddmon where are you going?" Asked Rika. Reddmon stopped, looking round, everyone was watching at him intently. "Ummm. I'm just going to go for a walk." He mumbled, then turned and continued walking into the forest.

Reddmon was quickly surrounded by the dense woods. Suddenly he heard a twig snap and spun around to see Renamon emerge from the darkness. "Sorry. Is something wrong Reddmon?" Reddmon shook his head. "Not really. Hey follow me." He said as he jumped to the top of a nearby tree and sat down on a branch. Renamon followed and sat next to him. "Renamon," He said looking up at the starry night sky. "I know we haven't known each other for very long, but I was hoping that after we deal with Cyberdramon that we could, you know, maybe go on a picnic or something, just us." Renamon giggled lightly raising her hand to her mouth. "Reddmon, are you asking me out on a date." Reddmon felt himself blush "So would you like to?" Renamon giggled again. "I would love to." Reddmon sighed, he was getting the hang of this.

Renamon put her hand on his shoulder. "Reddmon why did you start causing trouble around the town anyway?"

Reddmon looked from the sky to Renamon who was looking at him, her blue eyes radiant in the moonlight.
11111111122211121121211111.title: Reddmons POV "Straight on."

choices: "No.  It's something I have to do alone."
111111111222111211212111111.content:
"I was looking for something. But the thing is," Reddmon says, "I can't remember what it was."
"Come to think of it, I don't remember anything about my past." he admits as the thought crosses his mind. Reddmon lets out a small sigh as he continues. "Not sure how I came to the real world, where I came from, why I'm here, if anyone raised me... Nothing..."

Renamon and Reddmon continue watching the sky for a while before Renamon speaks up, "You do know that I'm here." She says in a caring tone. "And Rika, Takato, Henry, Terriermon and Guilmon are with you too. You don't have to face this challenge alone, that's what friends are for."
"But first, we have to get rid of Cyberdramon." Reddmon points out to her. Renamon rolls her eyes at him at ruining the mood.

"Anyway, would you like us to help you with your past?" Renamon asks in a more serious tone.






(p.s. First time adding something to a story and very sorry about the short chapter everyone)
111111111222111211212111111.title: "I was looking for something"

choices: "So how should we get him here?"
111111111222111211212111112.content:
Reddmon grinned slightly and shrugged "Just having some fun I suppose." Renamon shook her head and hit him lightly on the back of the head. "And what makes you thinks thats okay?" Again he shrugged. "Don't get so grumpy, I didn't do any serious damage, and I took care of you afterwards." Renamon sighed and closed her eyes. "Why are you like that Reddmon?" He cocked his head. "Like what?" He asked. "Destructive, what makes you want to destroy things and prove that your stronger than others?" Reddmon looked back up towards the night. "I don't know that's just how I've always been."

"Where did you come from anyway?" Reddmon frowned, thinking hard, he couldn't really remember. He only had scraps of his past that he could recall, mainly fights that he'd been in, nothing that really told him about himself. All he had was the vivid present. He glanced at Renamon. She was different to anyone that he'd met before, she wasn't scared or threatened by him. She seemed to genuinely like him now, despite hating him just a few days ago.

"Reddmon" She whispered. "I never thanked you for helping me before." Reddmon looked down at his paws, clasped in front of him. "Don't worry about it, besides I'm the one who hurt you in the first pla.." His apology was cut short as Renamon held his muzzle and turned it towards her, kissing him softly. Reddmon was surprised, but not as much as last time. As she broke the kiss Reddmon mumbled "Okay I get it now kissing you without your okay about it." Renamon laughed again. "That was thanks for protecting me when we fell, not for helping me before that. This is helping me before." She softly hit her knuckles against his face. Reddmon smiled to himself. "C'mon we'd better get back, it's probably going to be a hard fight tomorrow." He got up and took her hand, helping her stand. They both teleported back to the camp sight, arriving as quietly as they could.

As they appeared at the edge of the camp no one moved, all of them fast asleep. Two sleeping bags were laid out between Guilmon and Rika. Renamon took the one closet to Rika while Reddmon laid down next to her in his. As he laid down he swore he noticed Rika smile slightly.

The next morning.
111111111222111211212111112.title: "Just having some fun, I suppose."

choices: "So when do you think he'll show up?" (Reddmon's POV
1111111112221112112121111121.content:
Asked Henry as they all ate a breakfast that Orionmon had seemingly pulled from behind his back. "Well I suppose Reddmon and my self should go to the real world while you all hide around the clearing we'll use. Once there we will walk around until Cyberdramon appears to attack Reddmon. Then we'll knock him through a portal leading back here."

Reddmon stood up and clapped his hands together. "Well we might as well get going then." Everyone nodded and got up, stacking their dishes on the table from last night. Orionmon picked up the pile and threw it over his shoulder, where they all disappeared into a hole. "With that taken care of let's go. There is a place just nearby that should be perfect." Orionmon said as he started walking out of the clearing. Everyone followed him and shortly they were in a clearing that seemed almost identical to the first.

Rika was the first to notice this and she asked Orionmon. "So what's different about this clearing exactly?" Orionmon looked at her. "Simple. All the trees around here have nothing stored in them." Reddmon smiled to himself. He remembered asking why Orionmon stored things in the trees. He had said that it was better than leaving everything just laying about. A weird answer but true enough.

"Anyway is there anything anyone wants to ask before we get started?" Everybody shook their heads. "Everybody clear on the plan?" There was nods all round. "Good then Reddmon, let's go." He waved his arm behind him and another portal opened. Guilmon called out "Actually one thing Orionmon, What's the deal with those hole thingies that you always make?" Orionmon raised his hand to his chin evidentially thinking something over. "Well I wont go into the details but it's mainly an application of something called quantum physics. I use it both as a storage device as well as transportation. You see, I may be much stronger than Reddmon but I have very little agility. I can make fast dashes, but the portals allow me to move around the battlefield quicker."

"Oh. Really." Said Guilmon, probably struggling with the concept of quantum physics. Then again, thought Reddmon, who doesn't?

"Well let's go Reddmon." said Orionmon as he stepped through his portal.
1111111112221112112121111121.title: "So how should we get him here?"

choices: Renamon catches up to him (Renamon's POV)
11111111122211121121211111211.content:
Renamon watched as Reddmon and Orionmon disappeared to lure Cyberdramon here. Renamon turned back to their group. "So everyone, join your partner and go hide in a corner of the clearing. Digivolve to champion and wait for them to come back." Everyone nodded and ran to hide in the forest. She nodded to Rika then they both ran to a spot roughly between the boys.

Once they were all hidden there was a pair short bursts of light and a lot of shouting declaring transformations. Renamon did likewise and was soon a large yellow nine-tailed fox with a white mane. Rika put her hand on Kyubimon's flank and said. "Don't take unnecessary risks. Alright." Kyubimon laughed. "This whole plan is risky, but we are here for friends." Rika nodded solemnly then looked back out to the center of the clearing.

After a minute Kyubimon was starting to get worried. What if Cyberdramon managed to delete them both? They would all be stuck here for ever. Orionmon was, after all the only person who could enter and exit this place. "Kyubimon look." Whispered Rika pointing towards a hole that opened up thee metres above the ground. Suddenly Cyberdramon fell from it hitting the ground hard. After him plummeted Orionmon and Reddmon, both crashing into him. He quickly recovered and threw them both off himself. Both digimon managed to land on their feet, although Orionmon's landing was considerabley less graceful.

Cyberdramon stood up slowly, glaring at his surroundings. As his eyes passed over Reddmon he growled threateningly straightening his body towards him and taking a step forward. This put his back to Orionmon who raised his arm and made a forward motion, then launched himself towards Cyberdramon who was bearing down upon Reddmon. As he raised his claw to strike at Reddmon he was knocked from his feet by Orionmon's bulk. Reddmon dodged back out of the way as Orionmon raised his arm which was now wreathed in flame. He yelled "Blazing Pike!" and brought it down, at the last second Cyberdramon reached up and pushed Orionmon's attack slightly to the left.

A lance of flame burst out of Orionmons arm boring a hole into the ground. Cyberdramon held his grip tight as Orionmon struggled, then punched him hard in the face and got his legs in between them then launched he with shocking speed into and through several trees. Kyubimon looked back towards Cyberdramon as he got up and was hit hard in the back by one Reddmons energy balls. Cyberdramon stumbled slightly from the impact but before he could get his footing he was hit in the side by a barrage of bullets from a just emerged Gargomon. Almost immediately after he was hit again by a large ball of flame from Growlmon. Kyubimon saw her chance and gathered her energy and created several balls of fire which hit the stunned Cyberdramon and engulfed him in blue flame.

As he stumbled around flailing at the flames Orionmon leapt from the ruins of the trees and dashed towards Cyberdramon landing a blow at his gut. He almost immediately opened a portal behind him and jumped into it.
