          As the grieved knuckles rushed toward him Reddmon saw a flash of yellow, the Husamonâs head jerked to the side and the shield pinning him against the wall relented. He landed on his paws and lashed a foot out, hitting the knight digimon in the unarmoured back of his knee, the forces unbalancing him and sending him crashing to the ground. Reddmon rolled to the side as Husamon and the floor surrounding him were peppered be a flurry of razor sharp diamond shards.
          By the time the Husamonâs data had dispersed Reddmon pushed himself up against the wall and tenderly examined his shoulder and chest. The cut wasnât deep and was already stopped bleeding freely, but he was pretty sure his ribs where at the very least bruised, probably cracked.
          Rika ran to his side, holding her digivice and a hyper strength digi-modify card. Renamon was at the intersection, watching for anymore patrols, glancing at him worriedly.
          âAre you alright Reddmon?â Asked Rika, leaning close to inspect his wound. Reddmon just nodded and materialized a spray bottle of antiseptic and some bandages then handed them to her.
          After theyâd patched him up they assumed the same formation then continued on, although there was a few more close calls they managed to get to the control room without meeting anymore roaming digimon.
          Reddmon leaned up against the wall beside the door and waited for Rika and Renamon to take up positions opposite. He raised three fingers, then two, then one then pushed the door inwards. Ducking into the darkness he heard the girls padding in after him, then there was a blinding flash of brightness as they where hit by several spotlights.
          âIâm glad you finally made it,â
1111111112221112112121111121111111112111.title: Oops, spotted.

choices: Follow of course, we are the good guys after all.
On the other hand no need to be rash. That was an awfully large claw.
1111111112221112112121111121111111112111.content:
Reddmon squinted through the blazing lights, trying to find the source of the voice and cursing himself for walking into a trap, but he couldnât pick out any details. âIâm actually rather surprised you found this base, let alone made it inside, no ones done that before, although you always were rather exceptional.â Drawled a distinctly feminine voice, which was oddly familiar, yes heâd definitely heard it before. But from where?
          As his eyes adjusted to the harsh lightReddmon saw a shapely figure walking towards them, dark, but that was because of the lights. Then as they dimmed slightly he saw why she looked so dark, she was a LadyDevimon, tall and clad in black leather with sections that where seemingly alive, faces appearing then melting back into the material as she strode up to them.
          Renamon stepped up next to him and glared at LadyDevimon menacingly. âWhat is it you want? Either move aside or be knocked aside.â She growled, the hackles on her back standing on end.
          Reddmon barely heard her, this digimon was part of his past, he knew it. âAll Iâm trying to do is give you one last chance to escape , you wont get another when lord Reapermon arrives.â She replied, smirking down at Renamon, being much taller and of a higher level. But to Renamonâs credit she wasnât backing down an inch.
          He didnât sense any animosity coming from LadyDevimon, at least not aimed at him so he stepped forward and gently pushed Renamon back, putting a touch more room between the pair who where now deeply engaged in a staring match.
          âLook, Iâm sorry have we met before?â He asked, finally drawing LadyDevimonâs gaze of death from Renamon. As soon as she made eye contact with him her face softened, Reddmon swore he saw several emotions flash through her eyes, sadness, pain and old love, the last one Renamon definitely picked up because she growled again. Thankfully Rika pulled her back and whispered something to her.
          âI didnât think youâd remember me, well I guess I did a thorough job then.â She glanced around her worriedly, like she could be caught doing something wrong at any moment, then with a sigh of resignation she continued. âYouâre not going to leave either way are you? You arenât able to recall much from several years back right? Thatâs because I erased your memory.â
          âWhyâd you do that?â Asked Rika, strangely not getting any evil looks from LadyDevimon.
          âTo save him.â There was a snort behind him and LadyDevimon shot another look past him. Reddmon just shook his head and hoped a fight wouldnât break out, they seemed to have an ally here, something that didnât seem to run into him that often.
          âFrom what and why.â He forged on, dragging her attention from Renamon again.
          âYouâd gotten too powerful, Reapermon was going to kill you before you became a threat to him. And as for the why, well because, we used to be, intimate.â There was a scuffle behind him as a few muffled threats. âBut I see youâve already started a new life, with new friends. Iâm, happy for you.â Another flash of sadness, she broke eye contact with him and turned, walking towards a doorway underneath the large screens that took up most of the wall. âNow I expect thatâs what you wanted, itâd be best if you leave, now.â
          Reddmon looked back to the girls to see that Rika had an arm around Renamons neck, who had stopped struggling but was still shooting daggers at LadyDevimon.
          âSorry but we're here to defeat him, for a friend.â He stated, stopping LadyDevimon in her tracks. She laughed lightly then shook her head.
          âMy how youâve changed, Iâm glad I could give you that chance Reddâ¦ughâ She was cut off as a massive metal claw ripped through the door, shredding the jamb and knocking the steel plate of itâs hinges. Wrapping around her waist then yanking her back with a violent tug.
          Reddmon threw a glance to Renamon and Rika, just to make sure they'd seen that as well, and judging by their expressions they had. She had been helpful, even if she was an evil digimon they should try to help her. And that was Reapermons claw, he was sure of it. But he was also sure that was a trap, for real this time. "Damn! This sucks!" Thought Reddmon for what felt like the hundredth time that day
1111111112221112112121111121111111112111.title: LadyDevimon's explanation

1111111112221112112121111121111111112111.content:
“Alright everyone that’s a wrap for this morning, an hour for lunch then well finish the scene.” Called the director, a Gaomon wearing a berate, signalling the break. The lights blazing around the set dimmed down and Rika relaxed from the tense pose she was in.

         “Great!” She thought, “I’m starved” Renamon and Reddmon had dropped their fighting stances as well and had began talking about wether or not they had a chance at going out for a date, which made Rika want to get to the lunch room all the more, she and Takato had finally started dating and although he’d finished his work on camera he would still hang around and have lunches with her.

         “C’mon Let’s go.” She said motioning to the laughing pair of Digimon, Reddmon wiped away a tear and nodded, giving her a wide grin. Reddmon and Takato got along well but Reddmon seemed to prefer it when Guilmon came along, but after a series of “incidents” Guilmon wasn’t allowed on site anymore. Though she liked the happy go lucky dinosaur the room was usually quieter when he wasn’t in it.

         They made there way off the set and through the maze of trailers, filming equipment and other facilities one would usually see at any large scale production. Even though they’d been in the area for a while they got lost twice and in the end resorted to just having one of them take turns lifting Rika on to their backs and hopping onto of the trailers, instantly finding and heading towards the blue topped mess tent.

         As they touched down Rika dropped down from Renamon’s back Takato seemingly appeared from thin air and wrapped his arms around her in a fierce hug. She still wasn’t completely used to being this close but she repressed the urge to shove him away and instead hugged him back. Throwing an icy stare at the fox digimon as they gave each other a small smile.

         “So, how did today go?” Asked Takato as a steady stream of Digimon began emerging from the woodworks of the support crews sprawling collection of caravans. Husamon, Jundmon and Nasirmon among others, all the extras and stuntmon that made the show seem real.

         “Pretty good,” Said Reddmon as they walked over to the kitchen area and each grabbed a tray from a tall stack of them, moving along a line and picking plates of what they wanted from a large spread. And naturally Reddmon had his stacked high, at least double what everyone else had.

         When they had everything they wanted they wandered round till they found a few spare seats in the long rows of tables with integrated seats. It was still kind of weird, everything was designed to facilitate huge numbers of people, or digimon and had to be slightly larger than usual to accommodate the higher levels of the latter. They began talking about whatever came to mind as they ate roving from subject to subject as whim took them, that is until some weirdo appeared and strode up to where they where sitting, he was nothing special himself, average in most respects, but clothing now that’s what set him apart. He wore sandals, with socks shorts of a glaringly vibrant shade of orange and a deep blue singlet.

         “Umm, may we help you?” Asked Renamon with one raised eyebrow, a forkful of rice halfway to here mouth, the guys just seemed slightly shocked, “Probably stunned by those damn shorts. Thought Rika as the guy bowed low and readjusted a pair of reflective sunglasses he had low on his nose.

         “Morning, sorry to interrupt your lunch. I’m Horosuma the writer of the show and was hoping I could get your okay on a scene that I was thinking of putting in.” He simultaneously removed his glasses and pulled a thin sheaf of papers from behind his back, presenting it to Renamon, who cautiously gave his a long hard look then gave the rest of them a questioning look. She put her fork down and took the papers from Horosuma’s hand, Reddmon leaned over to read it with her.

         Rika tried to crane her neck to get a glimpse but she and Takato were on the other side of the table so couldn’t make anything out. But judging by Renamon’s expression as she slowly turned red as he eyes scanned side to side they wouldn’t be performing the scene this was confirmed and Reddmon, who was apparently a slower reader began grinning goofily, a thin line of drool running down from the courner of his mouth.

         “YOU PERVERT!” Yelled Renamon as she snatched the paper from a rather disappointed Reddmon and jumped to her feet, but Horosuma was already halfway across the tent, which was a fair distance in such a short time. Renamon sighed and sat back down with a growl and systematically shredded the papers with her claws.

         “What did it say?” Asked Takato, although Renamon had already sent her an outline via their special link, and it wasn’t the kind of think you‘d explain in public. But Takato didn’t need any such subtitles, Renamon’s expression made him drop the question instantly and he went back to eating his lunch, studiously avoiding eye contact.

         “I could tell you.” Offered Reddmon slyly.

         “No, you couldn’t.” Shot Renamon, firmly, clamping a paw over his muzzle. “Not if you ever want it to happen anyway.” Rika almost choked on her lunch that wasn’t something she needed to know.

A message from the author.
         "Huff pant huff, okay I think I got away with it, ahem, anyway I hope those that have been following have enjoyed it so far, although if you didn't you probably wouldn't be reading this would you?
Either way I would be really grateful for any feedback, or even better yet you opinions or helpful advice, still learning and essentially teaching myself."

*CRACK*

         "Oh damn she found me! See you later."
*slap* *slap* *slap* *slap* *slap* *slap* *slam*

         "Where are you weirdo? I know your in here, I can smell... damn I don't even want to recognise that smell. I don't care if you are the writer when I find you not even Azulongmon will be able to help you.

*crack* *smash* *rip* *bzzzzt*

End of transmission.

Owner's note: Wait a minute... This is my interactive! How come Horusuma gets all the glory? D8
1111111112221112112121111121111111112111.title: Character break!

choices: you are well enough to go.
you need to get back in bed and rest.
11111111122211122.content:
Several hours later...

Renamon slips out of bed as best as possible in the dark and the condition she was in.
Sneaking to the door she listens and hears soft snoring just outside the door. 'Good he's asleep' she thought 'Now i can get out of here'

Outside the door...

Grinning Reddmon could barely keep making the snoring sounds. 'Wonder what she's gonna try?' He heard the window sliding open and realized she was going to try to jump out of it. Not worrying he heard the window reach its fully open position with a faint click.
'5..4..3..2..1' SPLASH!

Outside...

"Who put this pool here!!" She muttered after she surfaced. "You done having fun yet?" a voice said. Glancing around she saw Reddmon standing at the edge of the pool watching her struggling to keep her head above the surface. "You gonna help me or what" Renamon asked. "Ohhh alright" Reddmon replied as he jumped in and towed her out. After materializing a few towels and after drying themselves off he says "You really should have listened to me when i told you to stay in bed". "Whatever" She replied. "Well i think....
11111111122211122.title: Bet she didn't see that coming

11111111122212.content:
Renamon gasped slightly as she woke up, "Wait how did I...,” she muttered softly as she crawled out of Rika's bed. "Well good morning sleepy head" Rika said as she stepped into the room, "how did I..." Renamon asked again as she pointed at the bed and looked around. "I don't know" Rika said as she walked past her partner, "after you left I took a long bath and when I came back you were out cold in the bed". Renamon shook her head; she didn't remember anything after losing conciseness while fighting that red Renamon.

Reddmon chuckled softly as he sat on the roof across the street from Rika's house; he smiled as a few things ran through his mind.
11111111122212.title: Wakey Wakey

choices: stop and see what they want
111111111222122.content:
"She should be fine now." he thought "I mean she does have her tamer and they are the 'experts' on digimon". As he starts to leave, in Rika's room. Renamon sees Reddmon out of the window. "Rika! quickly stop him!" she cries out while pointing out the window. Rika calls out the window for him to stop

he decides to...
111111111222122.title: Go home.

1111111112221221.content:
Reddmon stopped on the edge of the building as Rika yelled out the window...

Unfortunately he couldn't stop in time...

"Crap" he muttered as he saw the ground coming closer...

THUNK

Rika and Renamon ran up to see him on his back, out cold, "so should we help him?" Rika asked as she gently nudged him with her foot. "Might as well" Renamon said as she grabbed his leg and began dragging him across the street.
1111111112221221.title: Well he tried to stop...

11111111122212211.content:
'Man why does my head feel like i was hit by a freaking semi, and where am i anyway' Reddmon thought as he first got up. Suddenly he remembers dropping Renamon off and then Rika calling for him to stop and... "ahhh #^$*" He said clapping his hand/paw to his forehead causing another wave of pain to race through him. 'I cant believe i actually tried to stop, and on top of that I somehow managed to face plant off a building.' he thought. hHe checked his head for any marks and found quite the large lump on the back of his head. 'How'd that get there' He though and figured Renamon must have just dragged him here.

Suddenly someone walks in......
11111111122212211.title: Reddmon wakes up.

1111111112222.content:
Reddmon heard someone land on the roof behind him, "now what" he grumbled to himself as he sat up. He turned around to see Renamon slightly bandaged and staring at him with her arms crossed. "Crap" he mumbled as he stumbled to his feet expecting a fight.

He couldn't see out of his left eye and knew that would most likely be his weak point. He was now considerably weaker than her as her bandages looked professional while his were loose and already falling off. He growled and prepared himself for a fight but didn't really have the chance as Renamon teleported behind him and struck him over the back of the head. CRACK "ow my eye" he yelled as he fell to his knees holding the back of his head.

Renamon's confused "huh" was the indication that she let her guard down as he flipped around and attempted to kick Renamon in the face. She dodged his attack easily but that didn't stop him going on the offensive. He threw a few punches before Renamon sighed and grabbed him by the throat and threw him to the ground. "Ow" he grunted as he hit the ground and felt Renamon's foot on his chest. "You just don't know when to give up, do you?" Renamon said as she put some pressure on his chest.

"Guess I'm just a slow learner" he said with a smile as he grabbed Renamon's foot and twisted her off of him....
1111111112222.title: Renamon is back.

11111111122221.content:
"No way I'm giving up" he mumbled as he stood up, Renamon was already on her feet ready for his next attack. He smiled and thought "why not give her a taste of something new". He pulled out his digi-vice and activated it; Renamon shielded her eyes as he changed into ViralReddmon and charged her. She hardly had time to block as his fist connected with her stomach; she gagged and stumbled back only to get hit in the back by ViralReddmon's foot. She slammed into the ground and lost conscious, he smiled as he looked at her when a strange feeling came over him.

He shook his head a few times, for some reason he felt bad for hurting her. He ended up lifting her into his arms and taking her back to Rika's house. He laid her down on Rika's bed and left, "why did I do that" he mumbled as he paced back and forth on the rooftops. He couldn't get the image of Renamon laying face down unconscious out of his mind, "DAMNIT" he finally yelled as he slammed his head into the side of a wall, denting the wall in the process.

"Ouch" he grumbled as he pulled his head out of the indentation in the wall....
11111111122221.title: Reddmon vs Renamon

11111111122222.content:
Reddmon and Renamon were on there feet in a matter of seconds after that, Reddmon decided that now would be the best time to strike as he charged forward. He gasped as he felt the last of his strength leave him in mid-run, he fell forward into Renamon's arms and heard her laugh a bit before loosing consciousness.

Reddmon gasped and sat up on a makeshift bed on someone’s floor; he looked around for a second and realized that he was in Rika's house. "Uh oh" he thought to himself as he jumped up, he looked his body over and realized someone had re-bandaged him.
11111111122222.title: And......he's out.

111111111222222.content: Reddmon took a few steps forward and stumbled a bit, "didn't think I got my butt kicked that hard" he muttered as he lay back down on the makeshift bed. He laid there for a few minutes wondering why no one had come in to check on him, he kept thinking he heard voices coming from down the hall thou.
111111111222222.title: stick around.

1111111112222221.content:
Reddmon sat up and stumbled over to the door, if anything he could yell at them to shut up, he stepped out into the hallway and quietly walked down the hall. He stopped about halfway down the hall; he recognized the two voices, Rika and Renamon. "Are you sure this is a good idea" Rika asked, "no but I just couldn't leave him there" Renamon said, "besides he seems to be able to materialize things out of nowhere". "Darn it" Reddmon thought, Renamon must have seen him materialize his med kit earlier.

He looked up when he heard footsteps coming toward the hall, Rika walked around the corner, her eyes getting wide when she saw him. "Hi" he smiled as he tried to push himself off the wall, he groaned softly and hit the wall, sliding to his knees in the process. Rika quickly moved over to him, "you shouldn't be up" she said as she tried to help him. "Just a flesh wound" he muttered softly, he looked up when he felt another set of arms around him to see Renamon. "Come on" Renamon said as she lifted him up and helped him back to Rika's room, "now you stay here and rest" she said as she laid Reddmon back down on the bed. He grunted softly and drifted into sleep...
1111111112222221.title: Rika and Rena

111112.content:
"You're not the one I'm looking for,” he said as he leaned against a flipped car. "I don't care who you're looking for, your reign of terror is at an end" Takato yelled as he pointed at him. Reddmon couldn't help but bust out laughing when he heard that, "oh boy" he said as he straightened himself out, " you think you can take me?" "I know we can" Takato yelled as he pulled his Digi-vice out.

"Whatever" Reddmon said as he shrugged. Before Takato had a chance to do anything, Reddmon teleported behind him and knocked him unconscious in one blow. "Takato" the lizard yelled as he ran to his unconscious tamer, in another swift move he tripped Guilmon and slammed his head into the ground. "To easy" Reddmon muttered as he turned and started walking down the street, looking for more things to destroy.

After tossing a car into a building and destroying a large truck Reddmon sensed another tamer and digimon heading toward him. "Please be Renamon please be Renamon please be Renamon" he said quickly as he turned to see...
111112.title: Takato and Guilmon

choices: One of them gets knocked out.
1111121.content:
"About time you showed up" Reddmon said as he leaned against a flipped car, I don’t' know who you are but I'm gonna kill you" Renamon said when she saw Takato and Guilmon out cold. "Name is Reddmon" he said as he bowed before the two of them, he dodged Renamon knee and counter-attacked with a kick of his own. "Hey no fair you tamer can help you in a fight" Reddmon said as he blocked Renamon's punch, "I don't need help to beat you" she snapped back. "Oh really?" he said with a smile, "Rika stay out of this" Renamon said to her tamer. Rika only nodded and took cover behind a pile of rubble.

The two battled from deep into the night, to early in the morning.
1111121.title: Renamon and Rika

11111211.content:
Both Renamon were now barely standing, Reddmon was having the time of his life. “Getting tired?” He asked as Renamon stumbled a bit, “barely” she groaned softly as she wiped the sweat of her brow. “Good then you can hold this for me” Reddmon said, Renamon looked up to the sound of creaking metal to see Reddmon with a car above his head. “CATCH” he yelled as he threw the car at her, Renamon dropped down to avoid it but the car door smacked her in the face, she hit the ground unconscious. “Looks like I win, now to claim my prize” Reddmon said as he began making his way over to Renamon…

SMACK

Reddmon stumbled forward and looked back to see what hit him; he looked down to see Rika standing there with a large pipe in her hands. “Stay away from her” she growled as she readied the pipe. “Or what” Reddmon asked…

SMACK

Reddmon stumbled back again after Rika smacked him upside the head. He shook his head and readied himself to attack, but Rika was already pressing her advantage…

Renamon awoke a few minutes later to see Rika standing over an unconscious Reddmon. Renamon stood and limped over to Rika, “good next time you can take care of the Digimon” Renamon said with a smile. Rika gave out a weak chuckle and fell back; Renamon lifted her hand up and readied the final blow…

“Wait” Rika said quickly when she saw Renamon readying herself, Renamon looked over at Rika confused. “He had this on him” Rika said tossing Renamon a small device, Renamon caught it and looked it over. “This is a…” Renamon said looking down at Reddmons Digivice…
11111211.title: Ouchies

111112111.content:
"Are you sure this is safe?" Renamon asked as she looked over at Reddmon who was tied down to Rika's bed. "Not really, but I want answers about this" Rika said tossing Reddmons Digi-vice up in the air. The two looked over when they heard Reddmon groan, he looked himself up and down to see himself tied down, a smile curled across his face as he looked over at Renamon, "kinky..." he said with a smile.

SMACK

Reddmon was now unconscious again as Renamon stood over him, breathing heavily. "Um, Renamon, we wanted answers out of him" Rika said softly, Renamon didn't say anything as she glared angrily at him. "All right thats it" Rika said as she grabbed Renamons tail and dragged her out of the room. "B-b-b-but..." Renamon started, Rika then slammed the door in her face, "stay out there until I'm done interrogating him" Rika yelled as she turned over to the bed. Reddmon opened his eyes, ready to make more coments that would probaply get him hit, He looked over to only see Rika standing there. "Where's my wife" he asked with a smile, "wife..." Rika said an angry look on her face. "Well... yeah she lost to me so I get to claim here as a prize" he said with a toothy smile, Rika's eye twitched. She walked over to her dresser and grabbed a small switch-blade, "gonna be kinda hard do anything if you're CASTRATED" she yelled as she stormed over to the bed. Reddmons eyes got wide as he began squirming as Rika jumped and landed on his lap with her back to him. "WAIT WAIT STOP" Reddmon yelled as he tried to free himself. Rika slowly looked back at him, "you gonna tell me what I want to know" she asked, Reddmon nodded quickly...
111112111.title: Ouch

1111122.content:
"Jeez I'm bringing everybody but who I want out" Reddmon muttered as he leaned against a lamppost. He watched as Henry ran up with Terriermon on his shoulder, Henry pulled his digi-vice out and scanned Reddmon. "Look" Reddmon said as he looked at Henry, "you're not the one I'm looking for so beat it". "Not likely" Henry yelled back, "you're a digimon of destruction and we're gonna stop you." Reddmon began chuckling when he heard that, "goggle-boy and his lizard tried that a few minute ago", he said as he grabbed that lamppost and pulled it from the ground, "You sure you wanna go". Henry glared at him for a second before activating his digi-vice.

"Oh well" Reddmon said as he slammed the lamppost into the ground, sending shockwave which knocked Henry and Terriermon into the air. Terriermon landed on his head knocking him out. Henry landed not to far from Reddmon, who dropped the lamppost and began walking toward Henry. Henry groaned as he sat up, "Goodnight" he heard before Reddmon swiftly hit him in the back of the neck, knocking him out. Reddmon yawned and began walking down the street, wondering when Renamon would show up.
1111122.title: Henry and Terriermon

11111222.content:
Reddmon heard an explosion from behind him, he looked back to see an older woman wearing what looked like Renamon ceremonial armor. He smiled and looked at her, "there you are,” he said to himself as he looked at her. Just then a large blast of energy hit her, she screamed and split back into Rika and Renamon. Reddmon looked up to see a ChaosGreymon standing over the two, without thinking Reddmon teleported in between ChaosGreymon and Renamon. "Move aside little bug" the dark digimon said as it looked at Reddmon, "sorry but I was here first" Reddmon said as he tried kicking him in the face.

"Uh-oh" was Reddmon could think as he was thrown into the side of a building, he shook his head as he stumbled out of the hole that he made. He looked up to see ChaosGreymon readying his attack against an injured Rika and Renamon. Reddmon teleported over and grabbed the two of them, teleporting all of them into a nearby building. "Who are you" Rika said as she tried to sit up, "can't talk now got to go kick his ass" Reddmon said as he pulled out his digi-vice. "We'll help you" Rika said as she activated her digi-vice, "Biomerge" she said as she activated it. Reddmons digi-vice suddenly started beeping strangely as a light filled the room.

"What's wrong with this thing" Rika yelled as she shook her digi-vice, she went to activate it again when a large hand grabbed hers. "What are you...?” she said as she looked up to see a very large Renamon with dragon like wings sticking out of her back. "Rika I think something's wrong" DeviRenamon said as she looked down at Rika, Rika could only nod as she stared at her. The wall blew out to reveal ChaosGreymon, ready to attack, "Wait here" DeviRenamon said as she stood up.

DeviRenamon charged ChaosGreymon and attacked, the two struggled as the battle poured into the streets. After a few hours of intense fighting DeviRenamon finally emerged the victor. "That was great" Rika yelled as she ran forward...
11111222.title: Another digimon shows up with Rika and Renamon

choices: his wounds are still hurt and make the battle harder

"We DNA merged a little thing I picked up now, if you excuse me I have to go." said Reddmon. "Not so fast!" shouted Rika as Renamon started charging in a fighting motion.
111112221.title: The next battle

1111122211.content:
Renamon charged Reddmon, "hey I don't want to fight,” he said as she ran forward, "to bad,” she yelled as she jumped at him. Reddmon sighed and roundhouse kicked renamon in the face, she hit the ground unconscious as Rika ran over to help her. Reddmon sighed again and suddenly felt rumbling behind him, he looked back to see ChaosGreymon rising from the rubble. Reddmon felt his heart stop as he looked up at him, even both of them together couldn't take him out. Reddmon took a step back and looked over at Rika and Renamon, "get out of here" he yelled at Rika, "what" she thought as she looked over at him. She saw ChaosGreymon walking toward Reddmon, looking very pissed, "R-r-renamon w-w-wake up" Rika stuttered as she shook Renamon. Reddmon readied himself for battle when ChaosGreymon was standing right in front of him, "move insect,” ChaosGreymon growled as he looked down at Reddmon.

"Not a chance" Reddmon growled as he swung at him, ChaosGreymon lifted his hand up and backhanded Reddmon threw a wall. "RENAMON WAKE UP" Rika screamed as ChaosGreymon turned his attention on them. Renamon groaned softly and began to wake up, "where's that stupid..." Renamon started before Rika interrupted her, "he's not our problem now, HE IS,” she said as she pointed over at ChaosGreymon. Renamon's eyes got wide as she looked at him, "where's that red renamon at" Renamon asked as she looked at Rika, Rika just shook her head...

Reddmon couldn't think of anything other than the tremendous pain he was in. he was laying on his side, he was pretty sure he had at least one broken leg and a few broken ribs. He griped his digi-vice in his hand, "I don't want to do it,” he muttered as he looked at it, "but I don't have a choice" he said as he activated it. UltraReddDramon burst out of the side of the building, roaring angrily, he looked down to see Sakuyamon and ChaosGreymon looking at him, confused where this new dragon like digimon came from. He roared again and turned his attention toward...
1111122211.title: The coming of UltraReddDramon

11111222111.content:
UltraReddDramon growled as he looked at Sakuyamon, he immediately attacked her using a fireball type projectile. Sakuyamon dodged and began running, trying to get away from him. ChaosGreymon chuckled softly to himself as he watched the two of them go down the street. Sakuyamon was doing her best to avoid or block his attacks, but was having a hard time at it, "who are you" she yelled as she jumped from another attack. UltraReddDramon didn't answer, only attacked; he didn't seem content with attacking Sakuyamon and was mainly trying to destroy the whole town with her. She tried to counterattack, but the attack bounced off as if it did nothing, this left her open...

Sakuyamon hit the ground just in time to be grabbed by UltraReddDramon tongue and pulled into his mouth. She used her staff to prevent herself from being swallowed, she screamed as his saliva began dissolving her armor. "Looks like I can finish them both off at once" Chaosgreymon said as he built up a large energy ball and launched it at them. The ball hit UltraReddDramon with a bright flash, ChaosGreymon turned to leave with a smile on his face. "Where do you think you're going" he heard three voices say at once, he turned back to see Sakuyamon standing there. Instead she had red armor instead of yellow, spikes on her shoulders, dragon wings sticking from her back, and was carrying a halberd instead of a staff. In an instant Sakuyamon had appeared behind him, ChaosGreymon fell to his knees gagging as his data began dissipating. After he was gone the three of them de-merged, Reddmon was laying on the ground, still heavily wounded, Rika and Renamon rushed over to help him...
11111222111.title: Sakuyamon Dragon Armor  Mode

111112221111.content:
Reddmon awoke with a slight groan; "he's awake,” a voice said as he slowly opened his eyes. "The hell..." Reddmon muttered as he looked around, he was lying on a dirty bed in what looked like an abandoned house. He looked over to see Rika and Renamon, both covered in bandages, "what" Reddmon muttered as he tried to sit up. "Don't move" Rika said gently pushing him back down, "you got the most injuries out of the three of us". "What happened?” he asked as he looked at the two of them, "you turned into a giant dragon and tried to kill us" Renamon said folding her arms. "I can't control myself when I turn into that" he said as he closed his eyes and slowly drifted back into sleep.

Renamon sat down at the table with Rika and lifted up the small cup of tea, "he gonna be all right" Rika asked as she took a sip of her tea. Renamon nodded as she took a sip of her own, "his injuries aren't as bad as they look, but he'll be bedridden for a few days". Rika nodded and sighed, "I'm confused" she finally said looking up at Renamon, "he attacked Henry and Takato, but helped us, why?" Renamon shrugged, the two sat there for a few minutes in silence, "I'm going to go check on him,” Renamon said as she rose from the table and entered the bedroom...
111112221111.title: The next morning...

1111122211111.content:
Renamon opened the door to reveal an empty bed, "damn" she muttered softly as she moved toward the open window. Reddmon was standing on a rooftop a few blocks away from the abandoned house; he was holding his arm and breathing heavily. He shook his head a few times and continues to move along. "Gotta find a place to hide,” he thought as he jumped into an alleyway, he looked around and leaned against the wall when the coast was clear. He materialized some morphine for the pain he was in, when he recovered enough he jumped back onto the rooftops and began looking for a house.

Reddmon hit the bed with an oomph, he had found a place on the opposite side of town, it was larger, had a built in generator, running water, and a pool. It wasn't in the best condition but he would have to forge some documents putting it in his name.

"Red two tailed Renamon?" he asked, as he looked DeviRenamon up and down, Rika's smile turned to a frown as she nodded. "I'm not going to like what you're going to say next, am I" she said as she looked at Henry, "he's the one who attacked me and Terriermon" Henry said as Terriermon jumped onto his shoulder. (Reality)

Henry, Takoto, Guilmon, and Terriermon stood staring at DeviRenamon, "is she okay?” Takoto asked as he gently poked her a few times. Henry shrugged and shook his head, "no clue". Suddenly there was a bright flash, Reddmon groaned as he sat up. "Ouch he muttered softly, he looked around to see that he was on the opposite side of a destroyed car. "Explains why I ach" Reddmon said as he peeked over the car, he began snickering when he saw Renamon lying on top of the others. He heard sirens in the distance and decided now was a good time to leave.
11111222221122.title: They demerge.

111112222211221.content: "Stupid" Rika muttered angrily as she stormed down the street, "Henry leaving me like that, when I find him I'm gonna..." Rika rounded the corner to see Renamon lying on top of Henry, Takato, Guilmon, and Terriermon. Rika did her best not to burst out into laughter when she saw them; she made her way over to them and gently shook Renamon. Renamon groaned softly as she woke up, "you all right?" Rika asked as Renamon sat up. Renamon nodded "I landed on something soft" she groaned as she rubbed her head, "what's so funny" she asked when Rika burst out laughing. "Renamon do you mind getting off, you're heavy" Takato said as he tried to push himself up. Renamon narrowed her eyes at him, lifted herself up slightly and flopped back on top of them, "no I'm pretty comfy right here,” she said with a smile.
111112222211221.title: Comfy hahaha

choices: meet up with the tamers in human form
11112.content:
Reddmon thought "To be more convincing I should enroll myself in human school and I might see the tamers." So he broke into the school and put a file on a student named Redd. "This might change things around." he thought.

"good morning class we have a new student today named Redd" said the teacher. Redd/Reddmon came up and introduced himself "now go sit down Redd." said the teacher. As Redd/Reddmon went to a desk he saw all 3 tamers as he went by.

----------------------------------------------
AT THE END OF SCHOOL
-----------------------------------------------


Redd thought "I should befriend the while I'm in human form to study them." So Redd walk to the tamers (Takoto,Rika, and Henry) and ask them if they would be his friend since he was 'new' they said "yes" in a friendly voice. "Great" Redd thought.


-----------------------
THE NEXT DAY
-----------------------


"I'm tired of sleeping on roofs I should find an old house" said Reddmon......
11112.title: Enroll yourself into school

choices: Meet up with the tamers as Redd
111121.content: Reddmon was jumping from neighborhood looking for an old house with nobody living in it. Finally Reddmon found one with everythinng he needed T.V., bed, kitchen, etc.. "Perfect!" shouted Reddmon "Now I should see if I could find the tamers, to study for awhile." said Reddmon as he transformed into Redd.
111121.title: go find a house

111122.content:
After school, Redd meet up with the the tamers. Thinking that he could keep a better eye on them, and get a better place to stay, he says to them: "Hey guys, my place is being fumigated, I know this is a little sudden, but since I don't know anyone else, I was wondering if I could live with one of you. You know, temporarily."

"Yeah, you can stay in my place" You can not believe your luck. It actually work!
Now, who's house are you going to be staying at?
111122.title: Your new (temporary) home

choices: Meet Renamon in person as Reddmon
Follow her and stay out of site as Redd
1111221.content: That afternoon Rika showed Redd her house, and the room he was going to stay in, which was right next to Rika's room. That day went without any trouble, Redd made sure to behave and not draw attention to himself; on the outside Redd seem like a kind, thoughtful, well behaved boy; but on the inside Reddmon was screaming from boredom, he wanted action, adventure, and to cause trouble, not have a quiet dinner with Rika and her family, even he thought she was cute, a dinner with her parents and grandmother was not what he had in mind as a fun time with Rika. But Redd notice something during dinner, Rika would not stop looking at him, and would only look away when he would look back. "I think she likes me... SCORE!" Redd thought to himself. After dinner Redd explored the house a bit more, on his own this time. After looking around a bit Redd found what he was looking for... Renamon. She was even more cute in person he thought.
1111221.title: Rika's house

choices: " You idiot... Reddmon... You so arrogant..." An evil smile played on his lips..
1111222.content:
Redd stopped in mid thought, 'Wait... Him?! Damn, I was kind of hoping for the hotties...' Slowly, gathering up his strength for the greatest acting of his life, he said "Great! I can't wait to see were you live Takato!" as polity as he could. Inside, he felt like he had died a little bit...

With a smile and nod, Takato agreed to show him were he lived. As they continued to talk, Redd couldn't help feel uneasy; something about that Takato's eyes...Unnerved him. They were... just not right, almost evil... And yet, he seemed like clumsy fool. Who was he really? As Redd walked and talked with his new "friends," he couldn't help but feel on edge.

----------------

.Redd sat in the bedroom of the Takato, the leader of the Tamers, and actually decide not to destroy his home. Why? It was just too sad. Takato lived a bakery of all places and, from the looks of it, was between being poor and just barely afloat. Besides, the food was pretty good and Takato's folks were nicer than he thought.

"Man, why did I have to say anything?" Redd groaned, "Now I almost feel sorry for the guy..." As the words left his lips, the door to the room opened with Takato standing behind it, smiling. "Oh, hey Takato, dinner ready?" Redd asked monotonously.

Takato simply smiled as he answered...
1111222.title: Takato's house... Really?

11112221.content:
"You idiot... Reddmon... You are SO arrogant..." and evil smile played on his lips as his posture changed into a fighting stance. Redd felt a chill in the air at these words. He had felt this before, but where?! A dark aura appeared around the human.

"What the...?!" Redd was now worried, as the memories came back...

The aura tore away the room, the light, everything. Even Redd's appearance was unmasked, turning him back into Reddmon. But it was until the Takato form change did he truly realize the depth of his mistake...
11112221.title: Takato is... ?!?!?!?!?!

choices: About one week later (Reddmon vs the Tamers)
About one week later (Reddmon vs Rika&Renamon)
112.content:
It wasn't hard for Redd to sneak into City Hall and forge his birth certificate. It was almost to easy. But the fun happened afterwards. Since the Tamer's were 'busy' Redd decided to leave a message for them at their school. The school was deserted due to the fact that it was a Saturday, so it wasn't at all hard for Redd to get in. He looked at a wall outside the principal's office. "Perfect." a bag of blood from Reddmon's own veins appeared in front of him.(Yes Reddmon has a bag of his own blood, actually he has several.Go figure.) "I've been waiting for amoment like this." After a few swift strokes, he was done.

REDDMON WAS HERE. BEWARE TAMERS!!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------

"Class we have a new student please meet Redd."
(All right so Redd now goes to the same school and the same class as the Tamers. He did this all purposely.)
112.title: Redd's Message

1121.content:
"To easy" he said with a smile as he stood on the ruined streets, a Gallantmon and a MegaGargomon were standing in front of him. "Is this the best you guys got" he said with a smile as he hopped up and down, he looked at the Gallantmon, his armor was cracked up and down and one more well placed blow would most likely knock him apart. Reddmon smiled and yelled "come on is this the best everyone's got". He looked around at some of the other tamers in the area, most were unconscious, and those that weren't were too injured to do much of anything. "Oh well" he said as he shrugged, instantly he was behind Gallantmon ready to attack.

SMASH!

He smiled as Gallantmon returned to Guilmon and Takato, both flew a few feet before hitting the ground. He didn't even slow down as he charged MegaGargomon, "burst shot" he yelled as a barrage of bullets flew at Reddmon. Reddmon smiled and easily dodged the attack readying one of his own....

BOOM!

Reddmon was launched into the air by an unknown attack, and into an office building, "ouch" he said with a smile as he lay on a broken desk on his back. He saw a figure appear at the hole he made in the side of the wall, a grin ran across his face as he saw Sakuyamon standing there. "You want a fight then come on" she yelled as she readied herself for battle, "well now isn't this my lucky day" he said as he rolled onto his stomach and stood up dusting himself off.

START PLAYING MORTAL KOMBAT THEME!!!!

Sakuyamon charged him at full force; he attempted to block her attack only to be thrown through a wall. "Okay now things are serious" he mumbled as he jumped up, avoiding one of her attacks. Reddmon didn't stay on the defensive for very long as he charged her, coming in low and fast, he got her pinned against the wall. He had on hand on her shoulder and the other was blocking her staff, Sakuyamon was gritting her teeth while he just smiled. "I'm having a blast you know" he said as he stole a quick kiss from her.

She growled and threw him off, "Spirit kick" she yelled as her foot connected with his chest. He groaned as he flew backwards threw another wall, this time though the ceiling caved in on him. He lost a lot of strength in that last attack and couldn't move the ceiling beams crushing him. He was pretty sure he was bleeding and had more than a few internal injuries but nothing could be done about that now. "I think he's under here" he heard a female voice say as some of the rubble covering him started to move.

Some of the rubble covering his face was moved away, he saw Renamon standing over him looking at him. "Hi" he tried to say with a smile but most of his strength left him as he tried to hold the ceiling beam over his chest up. Renamon saw as the beam was slowly beginning to crush him, she grabbed it and lifted it off of him. Rika jumped over and began to rub the side of his face, they were saying something but he could hardly hear what they were saying, it all sounded muffled to him for some reason.

He saw Renamon move close to him as everything went black....
1121.title: Nothin better to do than knock people out.

11212.content:
Reddmons eye popped open as he woke up, he looked at his new surroundings, the room he was in looked like a hospital room. He sat up and looked at himself, he was covered almost from head to toe in bandages. He scoffed and began tearing the bandages off; he heals a lot faster than most digimon. "Must be DRT,” he muttered as he walked over to the door.

Strange man in lab coat appears on screen.

"Allow me to explain, the Digimon Response Team was formed after the fall of the D-Reaper to help contain any rouge and renegade digimon". "They help tamers and injured digimon with what few digimon approved hospitals they got." "Their weaponry and equipment are state of the art, unfortunately they never met Reddmon".

Strange man disappears.

Reddmon walked over to the door and pounded on it, "yep, DRT" he muttered under his breath as he walked over to the window. The window looked like prison windows with the bars they had on them. Reddmon smiled when he saw a simple lock holding the windows shut. He grabbed the lock and growled, "anti-renamon lock" he mumbled as he lifted up his arm. He smiled as he materialized the twelve-gauge shotgun into his hand and pointed it at the lock. "Lets see if your shotgun proof" he said, he pulled the trigger and smiled as the lock splintered and fell to the ground.

He pushed the window opened and smiled, he heard pounding and muffled talking from the door behind him, "little present for ya" he said as he materialized a smoke grenade and threw it near the door. He fell four floors and landed on the ground, without missing a beat he was up again and darted for the wall. In one swift jump he was over the wall, he looked back to smoke billowing out of the window he had jumped out and a yellow fox head looking out of it. "Cute" he thought as he disappeared into town....
11212.title: He wakes up

choices: Renamon thinks Rika having a boyfriend is cute.
112121.content:
Redd sighed as he walked down the street, he wanted to go fight some more or blow something up, but with the DRT looking for him he couldn't risk it. He heard talking around the corner, he peeked around to see Rika and Renamon talking, he smiled.

Explanation: Tamers identities are kept secret so no one knows whom they or their families are.

Redd stepped back and began humming as he walked around the corner, he looked at Rika who was standing there looking around confused. "Hey Rika" he said with a smile as he walked up behind her, Rika jumped and swung at him. Redd dodged it easily, "whoa you okay" Redd said as he looked at her, Rika sighed, "been tense lately,” she said as she stood straight up. "Well don't take it out on me" Redd said with a smile as he walked up to her, "Sorry about that, wanna walk me home" she said with a smile. Redd shrugged, "okay" he said with a smile. He was positive Rika had a crush on him, from stuff she said to him, to the look on her face when they first met.

"So ya later" Rika said to him as she walked into her house, Redd waved and began walking down the street humming softly. He didn't notice Renamon had watched them all the way home...
112121.title: Lay low for a while

1121211.content:
Renamon glared at Redd as he walked down the street, she didn't like him. "I just think you need to be careful is all" she said as Rika continued with her homework. "You don't like him" Rika asked as she looked up at Renamon, "I don't trust him is all" Renamon said. "His scent is identical to that red Renamon" Renamon continued as she began pacing back and forth. "Plus Redd was gone from school yesterday, right?" Renamon said looking up at Rika, she nodded, "and he just happens to come back on the same day that the red Renamon disappears". "Okay I get your point" Rika muttered as she turned back to her schoolwork, "I'll stay away from him for a while, that make ya feel better". "Not really" Renamon muttered...

CRASH

Renamon and Rika both hit the ground as the side of Rika's bedroom wall blew out. "Ready for the rematch" Reddmon yelled as he jumped into the room, he saw Sakuyamon charge out of the dust and swing at him. "Not this time" he smiled as he activated his digivice, Reddmon digivolved to ViralReddmon and began attacking her.

The battle was now even.

The two fought their way through the streets, destroying buildings and vehicles along the way. ViralReddmon was enjoying the battle that he was having with her, "come on that the best you got" he said with a smile as the two locked hands. He moved in quick and kissed her on the cheek, "creep" she yelled as she swung at him. He chuckled softly and jumped back, the two were locked in such intense combat that they failed to realize the digifeild appearing around them.

The dark Warriormon appeared in the middle of the field as the two continued to fight, his appearance is that of a ten-foot tall armored creature with a large claymore on his back, which he rarely uses. ViralReddmon landed in front of him with his back to him, he noticed someone was behind him and slowly turned to face him. "Whoa you are one big..." ViralReddmon started before he got slammed through a wall, "ouch" he groaned as he pushed the rubble of him. He heard a slamming in front of him and watched as Sakuyamon landed on top of him. "Aww I didn't know you cared" ViralReddmon said as he helped her up, "shut up" she muttered softly. "I hate to say it, but I think we are going to have to help each other on this one" ViralReddmon said as he moved over to the hole they had made.
1121211.title: Renamon suspects something

11212111.content:
"Unfortunately I think you're right" Sakuyamon muttered as she walked over next to him, she had hit this thing dead on and it didn't even flinch. "Okay I'll go in from the left you hit it from the right" ViralReddmon said as he crawled out the hole, "who died and made you boss" Sakuyamon said as she crossed her arms. "You wanna argue about this or you wanna do something he said as he began charging the Warriormon, Sakuyamon sighed and jumped out the hole and followed him.”Don't think that just because we're working together that we're allies, once he's down its back to business" Sakuyamon yelled at him, "okay, yeah, sure, whatever" ViralReddmon said as he jumped up and attacked the Warriormon.

Reddmon hit the ground rolling, the two were having a hard time with this guy, Sakuyamon was barely standing, most of her armor was cracked and that which wasn't had fallen off. Reddmon had reverted back to normal and was trying to force himself to his feet, he looked up at the Warriormon, its armor was cracked in a few places but it didn't seem to be slowing down or stopping. Sakuyamon charged him, Warriormon dropped his arm down and twisted to the side a bit, he suddenly brought it up slamming it into Sakuyamon's chest. She landed a few feet away from Reddmon, he looked over and watched the Warriormon slowly stomp toward them. "Warriormon's only move fast when the want to and that's not very often" Reddmon thought to himself as he stumbled over to Sakuyamon and lifted her into his arms. He heard movement behind him and saw Gallantmon, lance ready, charging toward him. "Right over there buddy" Reddmon said as he motioned toward the Warriormon, Gallantmon charged past him and slammed into the Warriormon. Reddmon took this time to get Sakuyamon to safety, he landed on a nearby rooftop and looked at the unconscious Sakuyamon. "Only a kiss from a handsome prince can wake the sleeping beauty" Reddmon said as he slowly moved in and kissed her softly on the lips...

THWACK

"I knew it would work" Reddmon said as he rubbed the side of his face, "geez what's that face of yours made out of" Sakuyamon said as she rubbed her hand. "You should stay here and rest I'll go help your friend down there" he said as he stood and stumbled over to edge of the building. "You're in no condition either" she said as she tried to stand up, only to fall back, "maybe, maybe not" he said as he jumped down. Gallantmon was on his stomach, pinned under Warriormon's foot, "HEY UGLY OVER HERE" Reddmon yelled as he jumped up and down waving. Warriormon looked over and began stomping over to Reddmon, giving Gallantmon the time to get up and attack.

"Bout damn time you got here" Reddmon said as he watched the Warriormon's data dissolve, Gallantmon stepped forward and brought the tip of his lance underneath Reddmon muzzle. "Hey watch it you could poke someone's eye out with that thing" Reddmon said as he pushed the lance away. "You're not getting away this time" Gallantmon said as he brought the lance back under his muzzle. "Yeah yeah, hey listen I...WHAT THE HELL'S THAT" Reddmon said, Gallantmon looked behind him. "Sucker" Reddmon thought as he disappeared, Gallantmon looked back and began stomping the ground.

Sakuyamon had fallen back asleep and was sitting against a wall, Reddmon sat there staring at her. "What is this" he thought as he looked at her, "this feeling... it's strange, I don't like it". He stood up and jumped away...
11212111.title: Sakuyamon agrees

112121111.content:
Reddmon jumped from rooftop to rooftop bleeding heavily, he gagged softly as he held his chest trying to dull the pain of his broken ribs. He grunted angrily as his vision blurred but didn't stop, he gasped as the ground disappeared from underneath him and he began tumbling toward the ground. He grunted in pain as he bounced of the ground and slid to a stop in a dark alley. Reddmon groaned in pain as he lay on his side, "well it could be worse" he thought to himself as he lay there...

KATHOOM

"Great" he muttered as it started raining.
112121111.title: Later.

1121211111.content:
Renamon jumped from roof to roof looking for that red digimon that had escaped after Wariormon was defeated
in mid jump she heard a groan from the alley below looking down she saw the digimon curled up in pain has she jumped down she wondered what to do with him
if she took him straight to the DRT his injuries might be ignored but if she took him back to her house then Rika might yell at her for giving away where they live
as she looked at him she felt a strange emotion she decided to
1121211111.title: Renamon shows up.

choices: And things just KEEP GETTING BETTER AND BETTER!! $%#
11212112.content:
"Fat chance" Sakuyamon hissed as she crawled out the hole alone, "Tch fine stupid (angry mutter angry mutter) meanie" Reddmon muttered as he returned to normal.

CRASH!

"Ouch" Reddmon said as Sakuyamon pushed herself out of the rubble of the new hole, "offer's still open" Reddmon said with a grin. "%^@& OFF" Sakuyamon screamed at him as she jumped out the hole. Reddmon sighed, "5...4...3..."

CRASH!

"Huh beat my prediction" Reddmon said with a grin as he walked over to Sakuyamon, "still think you can handle it?" Reddmon said with a grin, "uh hey you ok?" he asked as he waved his hand in front of her face. "Ha perfect time for me to steal a kiss" Reddmon thought with a large devious grin....
11212112.title: That's gonna leave a mark

1121212.content:
Once Redd had left Renamon turned to Rika and said " so are you finally begining to show your soft side?". "huh?" Rika said. "don't think i havnt noticed how you act around that new kid Redd." Renamon said. "oh him.. ummm yah ...." she said as she began blushing furiously. "don't worry your secrets safe with me." "thank's" rika replied.

Several Days later

'Man im bored' Redd/Reddmon thought, as he walked "home" from school. 'i wonder if i could get Renamon to come out and play.' he thought. After checking around he quickly shifted to Reddmon and headed of towards Rika's house. (you've got to hate it when you accidentaly tell your enemy where you live). He then threw an energy ball so it exploded right in front of her house.

Several minutes later...

"Man where is she?!?" He shouted. after a few more minutes he goes out looking for Renamon.

Where?
1121212.title: Renamon thinks Rika having a boyfriend is cute.

choices: "Leomon's Fist of the Beast King activate!"
1122.content:
--POV: Rika and Renamon--

'Get a move on, Renamon,' Rika thought to herself. Pulling out her D-Power, its blue trim flashing in the moonlight, she ran down the street to the digital field that had surfaced in the soccer field outside Takato's school. She put her sunglasses on as she burst through the layer of fog to the inside of the field. A gloomy purple tint put everything into a serious mood, and a second later Renamon came into focus beside Rika. Holding up her D-Power, she pointed it around; nothing. "I hope we didn't come all the way out here for nothing." she muttered.

"Where is this digimon?" Renamon murmured. Her ice blue eyes gazed around the empty field, looking for something, anything, to show why there was the fog. A glancing blow to Renamon's right shoulder brought her around. "Hey!" she spun on her attacker, lashing out reflexively. At first she thought she saw herself, but as the figure passed out of the shadows and into the moonlight, she heard Rika give a little snort. Her D-Power surged to life, the screen lighting up and producing an image of a red, fox-like, two-tailed digimon.

"Reddmon. A Rookie level virus-type. His Obsidian Claw attack leaves opponents in the dark." she paused for a second. "He looks a little like you, Renamon. Are you related or something?" after another few seconds of silence, Rika sighed. "You know what to do," she said.

"With pleasure." Renamon grated. She jumped high into the air. "Diamond storm!" At once, little glittering shards of data apparated and hurled down towards the other digimon. He quickly jumped to the side, deftly manouvering out of the way. Lunging right at Renamon, he spread his arms wide.

"Obsidian claw!" he cried, slashing at Renamon. He caught her a direct blow to the chest, and she crashed down to the ground. Rika's frame tensed.

"Renamon? Get up!" after her partner made no move, Rika whipped out her pack of cards. Selecting one, she held her D-Power in front of her.
"Digi modify!" she shouted, swiping the card without another moments thought.
1122.title: The Battle

11221.content:
"Hyper Speed Activate!" Rika finished as she slashed the card through her D-Power. Renamon jumped as she felt the enery enter her veins, to her eyes, everything seemed to slow down, almost as if everything else was moving through water rather than air. She rushed up to Reddmon and punched him, hard. From the look on his face, Renamon could tell he hadn't seen her coming. "Diamond Storm!" Again Reddmon didn't see the attack until it hit him, sending him sprawling to the ground. "That's it!" he said, "No more Mister Nice-Guy!"

---DARK DIGIVOLUTION---
"Reddmon digivolve to... ViralReddmon!"
----
Rika's D-Power glowed again, "ViralReddmon A champion Virus Digimon." she read, "His Devistation Claw leaves his enemies wishing they'd never born." Renamon charged preparing to attack again, but to her surprise, ViralReddmon-
11221.title: Renamon+HyperSpeed=Trouble

112212.content:
At the last possible second, ViralReddmon slammed his hand up and grabbed Renamon, lifting her up into the air. "I haven't eaten in WEEKS! I was thinking about eating some poor human, but I think you'll do!" As he started bringing Renamon toward his mouth he heard Rika begin slashing another card. "Oh, what now?" he spat angrily. "Digi-Modify Matrix Digivolution Activate!"
---MATRIX DIGIVOLUTION---
"Renamon matrix digivolve to... Taomon!"
----
After Renamon matrix digivolved to Taomon, ViralReddmon accidentally let go of her. "Spirit Strike!" ViralReddmon took whole hit, and his data started to disapate, but almost imediately reattached to him. "Heheh, never thought I'd lose to a couple of punks like you." he said before collapsing to the ground, but instead of turning back to Reddmon... "Rika, look!" Taomon said. Rika well, looked. "That's that new kid in town, Redd!" she said startled. Rika looked at Taomon, "What are we going to do with him? I mean we can't just leave him here..." By this point, Taomon had de-digivolved back to Renamon. "I'll take care of him..."
(Yay, first Redd/Rena reference!)
112212.title: A Tastey Snack?

choices: Get rid of the humans and move into their place
Try to convince the owners to let you stay in their place
113.content: Redd finds two good places to stay. One is a dusty, deserted, rat infested dump, while the other is a nice, clean, big house. The problem is that the nice one isn't empty. He could always make it empty by getting rid of the owners, but that may attract attention. "Now, which one is better? The abandoned house may be rat infested, but it's in a great location; close enough to keep an eye on the tamers, but far enough so they don't see me. While the nice one has running water and electricity, it's to close to the tamers, then again, where better to hide from someone than right under their noses."
113.title: 'Move in' to an empty house

1131.content: "Well i don't want to cause too much of an uproar. at least not yet." Redd said with a smirk. "So I should probably lay low and use this dump for my HQ, for now atleast." Redd proceeded into the small (4 rooms, front room, den, bed, and 1bathroom) rat infested house. "Time to call in the exterminator." Redd said as he materialized four bug bombs. ""Works on all of your household pests" perfect, this should drive em out. now lets see the instructions one bomb per room, great. Wait theres a warning label, do not re-enter the house until 24 hours after the gas has finished spraying. thats a pain but if it works." Redd quickly set up the bombs, activated them, and left. "hmmm where should i sleep tonight?"
1131.title: Move into the dump, but not just yet.
